Industries: E-Learning, Education, Publishing
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Education, Media and Entertainment, Software
Description: zyBooks publishes interactive textbooks that utilizes animations and embedded tools.
Full Description: zyBooks was started in 2012 by Smita Bakshi and Frank Vahid. Frank is a Computer Science and Engineering professor at the University of California, Riverside, and Smita, prior to her 10 years in the high-tech industry, and was a UC Davis Electrical Computer Engineering professor.We started zyBooks to help college STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math) students graduate. More than half of STEM students don't achieve their STEM degrees, and many students are tripped up by their early STEM classes. Part of the problem is the huge mismatch between today's students and traditional (and increasingly expensive and bloated) textbooks, forcing instructors to teach with one hand tied behind their back. Meanwhile, the real power of the web for learning—interactivity—has barely been tapped.  So, we started creating zyBooks—STEM material native for the web—using "less text, more action." zyBooks have minimal text, and instead consist of question sets, animations, interactive tools, and embedded homework, so students can learn by doing. We developed a platform to author, deliver, and continually support and improve zyBooks, vowing to always do right by the student and instructor.  We keep prices as low as possible, provide the best support we can, and make the zyBook platform easy to use for students and instructors. zyBooks are collaboratively authored by talented teams of professors, content developers and software engineers.  Professors include Roman Lysecky (University of Arizona), Sandy Irani (UC Irvine), and Andre Knoesen & Raj Amirtharajah (UC Davis). Starting with just a handful of universities in 2012, our computer science and engineering zyBooks are now used at over 200 colleges and universities and a few dozen high schools.

Description: Zomobo is a multi-linked, visual and module-based online encyclopedia providing related digital content from multiple sources in real time.
Full Description: Zomobo is a real-time, multimedia and social encyclopedia with millions of articles providing dynamic, fresh information; itâ€™s free to use and open for public participation, allowing users to discuss specific topics, post and answer questions, share relevant links or contribute in new creative ways. Zomobo presents organized results from Wikipedia, YouTube, Twitter, Flickr, Google News, Books, Blog Posts, and further contextual information, thus providing a quick, practical outlook for every topic. â€œZomobo is an effective medium to find and explore online content about almost any topic, providing a didactic and intuitive way of learning. In every article you get a basic definition, the latest related news, videos, images, twitter messages and relevant links, thus providing a quick, practical outlook of the topic. Since real-time contents are ranked with the most recent coming first, Zomobo can give you new information each day - even if you are looking at the same article. Every article can also be commented, providing a space for people to share facts, relevant links and opinions.â€ The sources in most online encyclopedias are static. Take Wikipedia for example. User submitted articles on Wikipedia have fixed sources for their articles. A change in the source therefore can present a problem for that particular article.Hence the Article freezes until Changes are done by the user. Suppose there was an encyclopedia with the latest sources accompanying its article on a subject. Not only will that be a great help to the encyclopediaâ€™s user, but it would make the article more reliable as well. Realizing the usefulness of such a search engine / encyclopedia and how beneficial it can be to internet users, Zomobo was born in the world of encyclopedias.Zomobo is a free to use Real Time Encyclopedia that updates and gathers the results of our query in real time. The advantage of this is that we get new / different results each time we execute a search, even if our keywords are the same.This makes it a Real-time search engine which is realy effective for a user to look for the latest are most relevant content. In addition to news and trending topics, the site has a simple search bar located at its homepage.Entering keyword in the search bar and starting our search quickly shows us gathered results from a variety of sources including social media sites and video hosting sites, in addition to standard search engine results.Zomobo combines Wikipedia results with real-time information from Twitter, YouTube and other information engines. Zomobo is a great web tool for those who want to learn something new every day, or for people who want to stay on top of any topic. Features:     * Aggregates multiple web feeds about a topic.     * Get information from Wikipedia, Google, Twitter, Digg, YouTube, and more.     * Fast and seamless.     * Free; no sign up required.     * View and post comments for each entry. Visit:- http://zomobo.com/about.php for complete information about websites.

Description: Zenergo is a social site allowing users to discover, connect and share with others around their favorite activities and interests.
Full Description: Zenergo is a new social site designed to Activate Your Life with easy, yet powerful tools allowing you to discover, connect and share with people and groups around your favorite activities and interests. Zenergo combines the functionality of email, photo sharing, event creation, group management, location and criteria-based search and calendaring in a single, safe, free and easy-to-use system, eliminating the need for many other website services. Most social networks take a â€œsingle bucketâ€ approach, meaning all contacts are considered to be in the same social circle, with the same social status to the primary networker. Other social networking sites only provide a single aspect of networking such as single group management or single event management. Zenergoâ€™s unique design and individual features provides a whole solution, thatâ€™s completely integrated The core technology, in development for over 2 years, is based on detailed, individual activity profiling, creating social resumes that map to real life and providing a more meaningful social networking experience.  Zenergo also offers a location-based and criteria matching service so users can expand their social network with new like-minded people.  Because Zenergo is activity-based, users will self-select themselves into their favorite interests (over 300 consumer verticals) initially allowing us to laser target marketing programs on a contextually relevant basis for national brands, local merchants and service providers. Zenergoâ€™s target demographic is the underserved post-college and above market, which is the fastest growing social networking audience both in the U.S. and globally.

Some of the unique capabilities of ZeeMaps are:          Scalability: Users can mark a few entries or tens of thousands of entries     on maps without impacting performance. ZeeMaps automatically uses marker     clustering or tiling as necessary.     Custom Fields and GeoSearching: Users can define custom fields for their     markers that they can use to perform powerful Geo Searches, e.g., all     Gold customers in California.     Multiple Forms of Data Input: Users can upload CSV files to ZeeMaps, tie in     with Google Spreadsheets or factual.com tables, or copy-and-paste tabular data.     Colored Regions: ZeeMaps provides capabilities to color various regions of     the world like cities, countries or states. For US, ZeeMaps also provides     coloring counties, zip codes, congressional districts, and state legislative     districts. Description: YieldBuild offers ad network management, reporting and optimization solutions for web publishers to increase revenue on their existing ads.
Full Description: YieldBuild is a new service from online publishing ecosystem HubPages. Their aim is to optimize the advertisement units of your website. They attempt to capitalize on a primary shortcoming of contextual advertisements: After their initial placement into text by publishers, formatting, placement, and layout is seldom altered and tested to see if response can be improved. YieldBuild is able to automatically optimize your siteâ€™s ad spots with the most profitable combination of ad layout, style, and network. The system continually tests alternative configurations of layouts, networks, and color as it looks for the highest performing ones. It takes about 10,000 impressions to train the system. As users become unresponsive to the ads, the system switches to a more profitable combination of layout and networks. Setup is easy and similar to Google AdSense. In addition to supporting some of the most popular ad network options, YieldBuild offers its publishers two ad source options - the Premium Display and Premium Text Ad Programs - with which to maximize page revenue. Drawing from choice network and agency network sources, like Microsoft pubCenter, Advertising.com and Traffic Marketplace, the Premium Ad Programs grant medium-sized publishers access to ads typically restricted to much larger publishers only.

Description: Wyst is an app that allows users to share thoughts, stories, ideas, and experiences via photos and text notes tagged to specific locations.
Full Description: Wyst is a new kind of message in a bottle: an iPhone app that allows users to share thoughts, stories, ideas and experiences via photos or text notes tagged to specific locations. As we go through our everyday life, we experience incredible moments and stories – all of them happening at specific locations. And deep down, each place we find ourselves in has a hidden story of its own; a wealth of moments others have experienced, and that we’re seldom aware of.  Wyst allows users to share those experiences - as they happen, where they happen. If users have a great story to tell that happened at a certain location, or took an amazing photo at a specific spot, or know a historical tidbit about a certain place, they can share it on Wyst - capturing moments and leaving them behind for others to find. Wyst was founded by Iker and Yago Amerlinck Huerta, two brothers from Mexico City living in Brooklyn.

Description: The WordPress Foundation is a charitable organization
Full Description: The WordPress Foundation is a charitable organization founded by Matt Mullenweg to further the mission of the WordPress open source project: to democratize publishing through Open Source, GPL software. The point of the foundation is to ensure free access, in perpetuity, to the software projects we support. People and businesses may come and go, so it is important to ensure that the source code for these projects will survive beyond the current contributor base, that we may create a stable platform for web publishing for generations to come. As part of this mission, the Foundation will be responsible for protecting the WordPress, WordCamp, and related trademarks. A 501(c)3 non-profit organization, the WordPress Foundation will also pursue a charter to educate the public about WordPress and related open source software.

Description: Test automation, QoE Monitoring
Full Description: Witbe provides end-to-end solutions for service providers, content owners and enterprises to monitor the Quality of Experience (QoE) of their IP services in a world made of Cloud and Over-The-Top applications. Using unique technologies specifically developed for a full IP world, Witbe offers the only solution capable of providing an accurate view of the only tangible reality: The end-user experience on any voice, video and broadband services delivered over any network, to any device (set-top boxes, computers, tablets, smartphones, game consoles, connected TVs, etc). Network engineers, support managers and business owners now have factual indicators and strategic dashboards to work efficiently together in monitoring and improving quality. They have precise and reliable information to pro-actively identify service defects, understand where performance drops come from and make appropriate investment decisions to increase end-users’ satisfaction. Witbe’s comprehensive solutions help improve quality and maximize revenues along the entire life-cycle of services and applications, from Build to Run and Big Data Usage Analytics. Technologies developed by Witbe are used by leading enterprises to monitor their intranets, call centers or strategic applications. Operators monitor their Triple Play service. Service providers, content owners and broadcasters monitor TV, IPTV and OTT video services. Developers can automate complex testing of new services, apps and devices. Witbe was founded in 2000 and now has over 400 customers on 5 continents. Witbe has offices in New-York, Montréal, Paris, São Paulo and Singapore.

Description: WireImage is a digital photo agency facilitating photos of all major events for magazines, websites, TV programs and wireless apps.
Full Description: Launched in 2001, WireImage has become an authority for celebrity imagery by bringing together a first-class delivery platform and a premier photographic service team. Our roster of photographers includes acclaimed professionals and industry veterans who have tremendous clout within the entertainment industry. As a top-ranking digital photo agency and wire service for entertainment, WireImage captures all the major events in the business, ranging from awards ceremonies, movie and television premieres, concerts, festivals, social events and much more. Our imagery appears regularly around the world in magazines, newspapers, websites, television programs, advertisements and wireless applications. WireImage also provides up-to-the-minute entertainment footage to leading broadcast and mobile carriers, and online properties worldwide. The footage division specializes in licensing wholly owned and represented entertainment content, in both raw and packaged forms. Headquartered in New York, WireImage provides worldwide image syndication through its international offices and a global network of affiliates.  In April 2007, WireImage was acquired for $208M by Getty Images, Inc., a leading creator and distributor of visual content.

Industries: File Sharing, Photo Sharing, Social Media, Software, Video
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Software, Video
Description: WiredReach is a software-based platform helping users share content without uploading, emailing or ftping.
Full Description: We build dead-simple sharing software that helps people share stuff easily - without any uploading, emailing, or ftping. We believe that not all types of content can or should be stored on the web - some data is just too confidential, too large, or too transient (e.g. files that undergo a lot of revisions). Sharing is the killer app but sharing from the desktop is harder than it needs to be. We build products that leave all your data on your desktop while making it dead-simple to securely share with others over a regular web browser. Our software is built on a proprietary peer-to-web framework (CloudStack) that blurs the boundaries between the desktop and the web, and brings together the best from both worlds - the ubiquity of the web and the richness of the desktop.

Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio, Other, Software, Video
Description: WeVideo is a powerful, yet easy-to-use, cloud-based collaborative video creation platform.
Full Description: WeVideo is the world's first cloud-based, full-featured online video creation environment.  WeVideo (www.wevideo.com) is a unique cloud-based collaborative video editing service that helps people from all over the world simply create and share great-looking videos. The WeVideo editor is easy enough for first-time editors, and sophisticated enough to help anyone create a professional-looking video. WeVideo works through any browser and as an integrated video editor within YouTube and Google Drive. The company's headquarters are in Palo Alto, California and its services are based on technologies that originated in Scandinavia. WeVideo is a cloud-based solution with no software to download or install. All video editing takes place in a browser on your smartphone. Video clips can be uploaded from any device to your own personal media library in the cloud and combined with titles, transitions, effects, animation, music, and narration for professional looking results. Users have full creative control over the final product compared to other automated solutions. The WeVideo platform uniquely enables social video creation by providing a collaborative online environment for video content aggregation and/or joint editing of the video story. All data uploaded to the system is safe from intrusion via highly encrypted password access, allowing you to control who is part of your video editing community. Finished videos can be shared on the WeVideo platform or published in Internet or HD broadcast quality to your favorite video-sharing site, social networking profile, blog or other destination.

The firm’s integrated approach to marketing drives awareness, credibility and conversions for 100+ clients around the world. An eight-time Inc. 5000 honoree, Walker Sands is one of the fastest-growing B2B marketing agencies in the world, with offices in Chicago, San Francisco and Seattle. Learn more at walkersands.com.

Industries: Facial Recognition, Information Technology, Mobile, Photography
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Software
Description: Waldo Photos is a mobile first photo sharing platform leveraging facial and jersey recognition to take hassle out of finding photos.
Full Description: Waldo is a photo finding phenom. With Waldo, every photo of you and your family, taken by others, is delivered to your smart phone. Whether it is at a football game, concert, amusement park, wedding, tourist attraction, triathlon or your just chillin’ at a friend’s BBQ, Waldo finds your photos and delivers them back to you. Waldo uses a combination of facial recognition, GPS, time and album code matching with the convenience of a text-based interface. The Waldo platform helps professional photographers increase their sales by changing the process from an antiquated hunt and peck, wait in line, one-off commerce transaction to a push system in which the potential customer is delivered their “photo needles” out of the proverbial “album haystack” to their smart phone, in real-time, with one click purchasing. For consumers, Waldo lets you live in the moment, put down the selfie stick, put your phone back in your pocket and enjoy life’s most valued moments. The days of wishing you could have gotten that incredible photo from an amazing photographer are here and the days of constantly nagging friends and family or feeling guilty about hoarding photos of others are over. Waldo is an intelligent, predictive, cloud-based, text-enabled, AI driven platform that lets photos flow from the photographer to the photographed, as seamlessly as it should be. Put the power of Waldo in your pocket and enjoy the moment!

Description: Sharing Content Playfully
Full Description: W;nk is building an OTT messaging platform and API that allows users to creatively share a wealth of multimedia content in a playful, ephemeral, and meaningful way. Communication is not just a matter of speaking, writing, and interpreting words. Indeed, it is a complex process that involves  factors such as content, language, grammar, experience, and nonverbal cues. W;nk's platform focuses on these factors and is working towards expanding the socioemotional context of our messages and what we share within them. In terms of the user experience, part of W;nk's mission is to bring a creative outlet to the way we express ourselves in the one-to-one and group conversations we have daily. We're aesthetic forward in our approach, valuing designers and creatives of all mediums, and believe we're only at the beginning of how we creatively share moments, laughs, and secrets with each other.

Description: Vushaper is a company that develops software to provide unique television experiences for viewers.
Full Description: We invented self-assembling video. With video technology patents as old as 1997 and a 2007 Emmy for the best video on demand experience, Vushaper delivers self-assembling unicast with the power of broadcast. Every second is relevant. It’s unicast with the big bang of broadcast.  Curated and authored experiences are valued for their entertainment power. In today’s world these are exemplified by feature films and video games. Like video-on-demand, video games are user-input dependent, but this responsiveness is bought at a high price: the viewer’s experience is limited to the rigid world of the authored app, and the publisher needs to deep-dive into time-consuming authoring.  Vushaper’s architecture is the only method that combines the power and momentum of conventional television with the relevance and immediacy of video-on-demand.

Industries: Art, Augmented Reality, Music, Social Media, Video Streaming, Virtual Reality, Virtualization
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Hardware, Information Technology, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio, Software, Video
Description: VRTIFY is the virtual and mixed reality music platform.
Full Description: VRTIFY is reinventing the way world produces, consumes and shares their music. Their revolution- ary technology gives the music lovers a way to experience their favorite artists and songs through the immersive power of virtual reality for the first time, pairing their music with custom- created virtual environments or immersing themselves in the front row of a concert. Their end-to-end VR solutions empower artists, tech players, content providers, developers and advertisers with the tools to connect with music lovers through innovative, top-quality VR music content. The VRTIFY platform serves as a new distribution model that is set to disrupt every- thing from record labels, event production and digital music consumption. Through integrating everyone's favorite music content from platforms like Spotify, Soundcloud, Instagram, YouTube, Facebook, Twitter and Google Street View, VRTIFY becomes a musical social network that brings the most popular applications and music service providers to life through virtual reality. Users can now create, in virtual reality, their own channels, share their music experiences, at- tend live concerts together and follow their favorites artists, events or music groups of interest. Artist and music industry are experiencing for the first time a “game changing” in music industry based on VRTIFY’s unique revenue sharing model (similar to the music service providers, like Spotify or Pandora but in VR) in which the 70% of the revenues are shared with the content owners. Today’s music consumers want new experiences and artists needs to find new ways to access to their audience and monetize their shows. VRTIFY gives them all a wide variety of tools that can be used to create, share and live their music like never before.

Full Description: VOXILITY AS3223  Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) in the biggest Internet hubs in the world, designed for service providers and large websites  Voxility is an international Infrastructure-as-a-Service provider with offices in London, Frankfurt, Bucharest and San Francisco, founded in 2004 with a clear development strategy aimed at becoming a reference name in cloud computing. According to peeringdb.com ranks in top 100 largest internet networks on the planet, based on its 2 Tbps+ edge traffic capacity.  Since 2012, Voxility has extended the performances of its network at a global level, through several high capacity agreements with companies such as Level3 Communication, Comcast, NTT, Telia Carrier, Telefonica or Deutsche Telecom. Its 2Tbps+ edge traffic network is directly connected to >1650 other networks for the best regional content distribution so that Voxility can quickly deliver almost all kinds of enterprise hardware and network configurations in London, Frankfurt, Vienna, Prague, Amsterdam, Madrid, Bucharest, Washington, Los Angeles and Miami.  The company runs a powerful global platform covering a broad range of Data Center services such as Premium Colocation, Dedicated Server hosting, DDoS Protection Solutions, IP transit and custom built cloud infrastructure hosting. Some of the largest websites and internet service providers rely on Voxility to deliver day-to-day value to their customers.  DEDICATED SERVERS offerings: https://www.voxility.com/dedicated-server. DDoS Protection solutions: https://www.voxility.com/anti-ddos. Premium Colocation: https://www.voxility.com/colocation/prices. Their newspaper product line includes, CircPort, CircPort Mobile, CircPort Web and Dispatch - all their products allow a newspaper to reduce costs by providing a multi-channel, cost-efficient and personalized communications alternative to reduce call-center costs. On the pharmacy side of their business, their PharmaPhonetics proactive HIPAA & PIPEDA compliant patient communications platform delivers multi-channel, cost-effective, automated, personalized, and intelligent interactive communications that allows a pharmacy to engage with patients directly on behalf of the pharmacy, via permission-based outbound calls, text messages, email or through mobile applications. Description: Vixely is a digital media company that produces and curates interactive media designed for tablet devices.
Full Description: Vixely is a digital media company that produces and curates interactive media designed exclusively for the tablet. Vixely addresses the need that Gen Y women need a tasteful, trusted place to find high-quality information on topics crucial to their health and self-esteem. Vixely is their solution to find the answers and advice they need in a voice that resonates and on a platform that fits their digital lifestyles. The Vixely portfolio of digital products allows users to visually experience media content and advice that is tailored, relevant and reflects real life experiences and discussions with friends.  The Vixely iPad Magazine is available in the app store and their debut issue "Let's Get it On!" was released on May 1, 2012 in the iPad Newsstand. The magazine offers advice and entertainment on topics such as sex, dating, health, fashion and lifestyle. The content is designed specifically for the iPad, providing readers with a fun, informative and interactive media experience including in-app shopping with product recommendations, music mixes and video. Friends since college, co-founders Jennifer Eident, Nora Bass and Lara Glaister reconnected over their shared passion to solve women’s needs through content, technology and design. Vixely was born out of their frustration over the lack of quality content for women in a voice that resonates and that is designed to fit our digital lives. They wanted to create a media experience that captures women’s real life experiences, as well as the questions and conversations they shared with their friends.  Vixely also has an iPad app on sex advice targeted to men called "31 Ways to Satisfy Her" and two interactive iPad iBooks "Female Orgasm: The Ultimate Guide" and "The Guide to Dating."

Description: Vision Data Equipment provides quality newspaper software for over 38 years.
Full Description: Vision Data Equipment Corporation was incorporated in 1973 and entered full-time into the newspaper software business in 1976. Vision Data has built its business based on Circulation, Display Ad Billing, Receivables, Classified, and General Accounting. They currently support over 1500 publications, ranging from small newspapers with one or two users, to large installations with hundreds of users.In 1997 Vision Data introduced Vision Total Advertising, the industry's first Integrated Classified and Display Ad Taking and Billing system utilizing a single database. A concept that drives Vision Data is that Circulation, Display Ad Billing, Classified Ad Sales, and all receivables should interact as a unified business process. Full Description: Based in Silicon Valley, Visbit, Inc. is a visual technology company enabling 360-degree video and VR content creators to deliver the highest quality streaming and viewing experiences to consumers across multiple VR platforms. With the patented Visbit View-Optimized Streaming (VVOS) technology, Visbit is the first to offer a streaming service that can deliver and play 360-degree VR videos without noticeable latency in 4-8K resolution over regular Wi-Fi and LTE across VR headsets and platforms.  Visbit’s technology allows premium quality 360-degree VR video to be viewed without downloading or heavy compression, which improves user experience, increases user reach at existing bandwidth and saves overall data usage – closing the gap between VR content requirements and typical network speed capabilities.  The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Sunnyvale, CA. For more information go to www.visbit.co.

Description: Virtual Reality Minds offers a patent-pending streaming television platform for smart TV with virtual reality mode and live shopping.
Full Description: Virtual Reality Minds Inc. has developed an independent television platform and technology that enables video publishers to deploy standalone premium linear cable TV-like live television channels and services direct to consumers via next-gen devices such as Virtual Reality, Smart Television, Smartphones and In-Vehicle Infotainment. The VRMinds co-founders have authored a series of patents on the platform and the technology is now ready for commercial release.  Virtual Reality Minds, Inc. is a Delaware State Corporation co-founded by Moses Johnson and Hari Eppanapally and is proud to be an all-American, pure design and development team, based in Orlando Florida. The company is seeking a partnership or merger with a company that is in position to launch the technology into the marketplace and monetize and cultivate the patent portfolio. Currently we have two commercial versions of the original from-the-ground-up independent television broadcasting platform.  It’s called Moodstreem.  Our goal with this first version is to offer content providers that are growing an audience via video on social media to take their audience off social media and into a direct relationship where the viewer can subscribe directly right in the living room to the publisher and the publisher can charge $ for access and for goods sold during broadcasts. Also the added benefit of not having to compete for viewer attention and retention by having your own private app and channel. Product 1: Osirus The product, marketed as Osirus (http://osirus.online) has turn-key content management and development tools for creating and managing private-label television channels in HD and 3D. (bespoke version where we compile and customize original channels for clients under a partnership) Platform Features: Linear TV Server for television broadcasting from pre-recorded videos Multi-platform compatible fully branded TV channel player 3D Television Mode for Virtual Reality Headsets On Screen Shopping links for real-time shopping channels with on-the-air buy-it-now monetization Product 2: VRMAKER3D The other version of the platform is called VRMAKER3D VRMAKER3D is an out of the box developer kit that enables novice developers to compile and deploy single and multi-channel television channels that are compatible with Google Cardboard and popular VR headsets like Oculus Rift and Mattel’s VR ViewMaster.  Apps compiled using VRMAKER3D are able to be deployed direct to consumers and popular app stores for android and apple iOS compatible devices including but not limited to Smart Televisions, Smartphones, In-Vehicle Infotainment, Gaming Devices and Set-Top-Boxes. Developer Kit includes: SDK for Linear TV Server for television broadcasting from pre-recorded videos SDK for Multi-platform compatible fully branded TV channel player SDK for 3D Television Mode for Virtual Reality Headsets Built-in On-Screen Shopping links for real-time shopping channels with on-the-air buy-it-now monetization We have developed a series of real-time second screen interactive features that could enable smart television watchers to use their mobile device to interact with live items that appear on screen during broadcasts.  We're building an intelligent broadcast platform that takes viewing and shopping and blends them into a watchable and highly enjoyable new experience for viewers who want more from their television experience and are willing to pay for it.

Description: Viral is the creator of Veera, an app designed to allow content to go viral
Full Description: Viral was the creator of Veera, an app that allowed users to share content without being limited to their friends, followers, or subscribers. Users of the app were allowed to create "Strains" -  messages in the form of images, videos, text, and links.  Once uploaded, a Strain was shared with 10 random users on the network. Users that received a Strain had 120 seconds (except in the case of links) to share or dismiss the Strain. If one of them shared it, the Strain was sent to another 10 users. If all ten shared it, the Strain was sent on to another 100 users and so on, expediting and facilitating the process of virality for that Strain. The app also featured a "Trending Strains" page where users could browse viral Strains by category.

Full Description: At VikPik, it's not who you are, it's where you are. Description: VigLink is a platform for monetizing content-driven commerce for publishers, bloggers, forums, social networks and apps.
Full Description: VigLink is a platform for monetizing content-driven commerce. VigLink is built on the idea that publishers should be compensated for the content they create and the commerce they drive. The company monetizes ordinary links to over 30,000 retailers with technology that works across sites, apps, and social networks. Because the monetization is automated, content publishers can focus on creating great content and avoid the hassles of managing countless affiliate programs. The largest network of its kind, VigLink maximizes earnings for tens of thousands of publishers and works with more than 30,000 merchants, processing over ten billion page views and over five hundred million clicks every month. VigLink offers publishers three products: [VigLink Convert](http://www.viglink.com/products/convert) converts _existing_ links into links that earn revenue. Clicks that turn into purchases from anyone in their growing list of over 30,000 retailers, turn into commissions. Through its exclusive [optimizer](http://www.viglink.com/products/convert/optimizer) technology, VigLink can optionally swap existing links for more lucrative alternatives. [VigLink Insert](http://www.viglink.com/products/insert) uses state-of-the-art semantic technology to automatically link text mentions of merchants, brands, and products to the most relevant and valuable destination. Publishers typically double their VigLink revenue after enabling this feature. [VigLink Anywhere](http://www.viglink.com/products/anywhere) monetizes links posted to Twitter, Facebook, YouTube or even emails. Publishers just build the URL with VigLink, shorten if they like, and share anywhere. Influencers get paid when clicks turn into purchases. VigLink offers detailed reporting and analytics for publishers to learn which links drive the most revenue and stay focused on what's working.  Given their scale, VigLink can negotiate higher commission rates from top merchants and pass these higher payouts to customers. Their current merchant list is available publicly [here](http://www.viglink.com/merchants)

Description: Helping people get the most out of their photo collections.

Once tagged, photos can be searched, explored, shared, and used. We are focused on providing offline auto tagging, photo editing, sharing and other useful features. Description: Complete Cloud Video Surveillance (VSaaS) for Commercial, Education and Government Customers.
Full Description: VIAAS, formerly CudaCam by Barracuda Networks, is an integrated cloud-based video surveillance service provider, selling turn-key solutions to qualified commercial customers through channel partners, VAR’s and systems integrators.  VIAAS video surveillance as a service (VSaaS) was launched in 2008 under Barracuda Networks ownership, and was spun out as a new corporation (VIAAS, Inc.) in June 2017.   VIAAS designs and engineers the complete solution and  has cameras manufactured to its specifications through an OEM supplier arrangement.  The VIAAS platform includes proprietary cloud-camera connectivity firmware, cloud navigation, administration, video storage, playback, and data architecture. The VIAAS Secure Cloud platform is hosted on Amazon Web Services (AWS).     To date, VIAAS has delivered thousands of cameras to hundreds of SMB, education and enterprise customers, throughout the US, Canada, and Mexico. With 10 years of experience, VIAAS is among the most mature and advanced VSaaS solutions in the market and holds 3 issued U.S. patents.

The company's real-time network AI engine enables demanding applications (e.g VR/AR, video, drones, connected cars) to deliver great experiences over dynamic mobile networks. They are solving large scale real-time AI/data engineering problems: Uhana's cloud native software platform ingests large amounts of telemetry data from existing network elements and from apps. The platform also runs specific neural networks to deliver real-time, predictive guidance for applications and network layer control to accelerate the application quality of experience. They are delivering benefits to applications and networks: Uhana's deep learning engine delivers benefits to OTT applications even without any network telemetry or control, and similarly to network providers without having any application layer telemetry or control. This enables the Uhana engine to onboard apps and mobile networks independently.

Trapica uses AI to update campaign targets and keywords based on who is converting while the campaign is running. Our integration is simple  -  It only takes 2 clicks to add trapica to your marketing campaigns, From there, you will be set up with a Trapica dashboard that highlights the key metrics that we optimize. then, our algorithms take over continuously learning about the audiences that are converting best at that time and Implementing those learning in your marketing campaigns. Description: TrafficLand broadcasts on-demand live videos on internet and television, granting access through various IT-enabled devices.
Full Description: TrafficLand, Inc. aggregates and broadcasts on demand live traffic video information via the Internet and television. The company provides access to live traffic views from desktop computers, and Web-enabled cell phones and PDAs, as well as solutions for driving public, first responders, DoT services, media organizations, commercial enterprises, and emergency management through a Video Distribution System. It also provides SecurityLand communication services, including IP-video network design, installation, acquisition, integration, distribution, and maintenance services. In addition, the company operates a transportation video information sharing network, as well as allows commuters, businesses, government agencies, and broadcast partners to access cameras and traffic camera videos for traffic information in the United States. Further, it provides 3D Traffic, a video management tool that enables traffic and news production operations to search, set-up, and broadcast real-time videos; TrafficLand Web Embed that features interactive maps and local market traffic camera videos; and Traffic on the Go, a mobile Web application developed for broadcast affiliates. TrafficLand, Inc. was formerly known as SecurityLand, Inc. and changed its name to TrafficLand, Inc. in 2001. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Fairfax, Virginia.

Industries: Apps, Social Bookmarking
Industry Groups: Apps, Content and Publishing, Other, Software
Description: Social Bookmarking with Twitter
Full Description: Krumlr is social bookmarking site that allows users to bookmark URLs while they tweet about them to Twitter. Krumlr users can drag a link to their browser that will automatically copy the URL of the open page, then shorten it and append to their comment as a tweet to Twitter.  In the same step Krumlr will also categorize, tag and save the "krum" to their Krumlr profile. Krumlr's has a follow-me, follow-you  interface (similar to Twitter's) making it easy to discover what pages other Krumstrs are bookmarking  and tweeting about (TweetMarking). To see what another Krumstr is doing, simply click on their profile. To track multiple users, follow them and their "krums" will appear on your Trail Krum page. Krumlr has thousand of tagged links that can be searched, picked up, or retweeted with a simple click. For feedback, Krumlr tracks your tweets. This includes number of clicks, where (by country IP), and time since tweet. Krumlr ranks users by activity and lists pages chronologically or by popularity. Krumlr uses Twitter OAuth so Krumstrs can share their URLs but not their passwords.

Industries: Enterprise Software, Publishing, Social Media, Software
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Software
Description: Traction builds software for work that combines collaboration and action tracking.
Full Description: Traction Software Inc. set out to eliminate the frustrating and costly inefficiencies in team communications and information management by creating a revolutionary web-based hypertext Journal. Traction TeamPage was first released in 1999 and, after commercial launch in July 2002, became the first blog and wiki product for enterprise use. TeamPage is used worldwide by major pharma, finance, manufacturing, healthcare and other enterprises, universities, and branches of the U.S. Government. Traction draws heavily on pioneering techniques and visions from the work of Doug Engelbart, Ted Nelson, Andy van Dam, and Vannevar Bush. The Traction Journal was directly inspired by Doug Engelbart's 1992 paper Toward High-Performance Organizations: A Strategic Role for Groupware and Vannevar Bush's Memex concept from his 1945 Atlantic Monthly article, As We May Think. Engelbart's hypertext Journal (part of NLS for oN Line System) first demonstrated in 1968 served as a model and starting point for Traction TeamPage development.

Description: Tizra offers an agile digital publishing platform with powerful content curation, search, sales and delivery capabilities.
Full Description: Tizra Publisher helps users move from PDF files to remixable, brandable, sellable and access-controllable online content via a user's own website.  Sites now running on Tizra Publisher include: [Auto Care Association](https://digital.autocare.org/) [American Mathematical Society](https://bookstore.ams.org/) [Einstein Papers Project](http://einsteinpapers.press.princeton.edu) [American Hospital Association](https://ub04.aha.org/) [American Ceramic Society](https://bulletin-archive.ceramics.org/) [ABC-CLIO Ebooks](http://publisher.abc-clio.com)  Tizra Publisher combines a web control panel with tightly integrated content management, access control, commerce, and web design capabilities. As a result, non-technical users can quickly create new online products and respond to market and user feedback in ways that used to take months of developer time. With Tizra Publisher you can... * Unbundle documents into chapters, subsections or even individual pages, then tag, remix and rebundle into dynamic collections based on topic, author, or any other metadata. * Manage access to your content with time-limited subscriptions, role-based content visibility, variable numbers of concurrent seats, flexible download options, and IP based authentication for corporate accounts. * Promote and sell your content with built-in ecommerce, selective discoverability by Google and other search engines, targeted promotions, limited time free trial offers and discount codes. * Customize branding, anywhere from basic logo and color selection through complete site re-skinning and re-structuring using their drag and drop template editor and standard CSS web design tools. * Integrate with your own web applications via REST API to create seamless single sign-on and shopping cart experiences for your users.

Description: Tiki Wiki CMS Groupware is a free Open Source web application platform.
Full Description: Tiki Wiki CMS Groupware is a full-featured, web-based, multilingual (40+ languages), tightly integrated, all-in-one Wiki+CMS+Groupware, Free Source Software (GNU/LGPL), using PHP, MySQL, Zend Framework, jQuery and Smarty. Tiki can be used to create all kinds of Web applications, sites, portals, knowledge base, intranets, and extranets. Description: Tiger Analytics offers data analytics and predictive modeling solutions for retail, social media, and online advertising sectors.
Full Description: Tiger Analytics is a boutique consulting company focusing on data analytics and predictive modeling in some of the high growth areas such as retail, social media, and online advertising. We are a strong team of data scientists and business consultants with in-depth knowledge and experience solving data related problems -- social media analytics, customer insights, customer analytics, forecasting, inventory and promotion planning, scheduling, pricing and revenue management. Through our understanding of businesses, coupled with expertise in advanced quantitative frameworks and state-of-the-art technologies, we help our clients take decisions in a scientific manner.  Data Sciences:  Econometrics, Bayesian Statistics, Optimization, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Natural Language Processing  Select Methodologies:  Linear/Nonlinear/Logistic Regressions, Time-Series models, Linear Programming, Latent Class methods, MCMC methods, Structural Equation models, Neural Networks, Support Vector Machines, Discrete Choice models, Hierarchical Bayes models etc.  Tools / Technologies:  R, SAS, MATLAB, SPSS, CPLEX, GAMS, Gauss, Python, C++, Java, PHP, MySQL, VBA, Tableau, Spotfire, and several other open source tools  We are headquartered in Santa Clara, CA, with additional offices in Chicago, Illinois and Chennai, India.

The company's media titles are unique in that they feature the world's greatest professors but are written and produced specifically for the convenience of lifelong learners. As of 2015, The Great Courses offers nearly 15,000 lectures via apps for iPhone, iPad, Android, Roku, and Kindle Fire, plus DVD, CD, streaming and download formats in subjects spanning science, math, history, fine arts, music, religion, philosophy, literature, business, health and wellness, and personal and professional development. In addition to direct sales, The Great Courses titles are available via The Great Courses Plus, a subscription video-on-demand service, and can also be found on Netflix, Amazon Instant Video, cable TV video on demand, Audible.com, SiriusXM Radio, Virgin America in-flight video, Delta Airlines, Craftsy, and a growing number of other digital channels.

Description: A police conduct reporting app & interactive mapping system of police violence.
Full Description: SWAT let's you upload real-time video and live-stream it to friends nearby. As soon as you start recording, SWAT uploads your video to our servers, protecting evidence of your encounter with police even if the phone is confiscated or destroyed.  Each video is time-stamped and geotagged, so there’s an exact record of your interaction with police. The app also automates the police complaints process and informs you of your rights based on where you are.  SWAT uses the evidence collected to engineer a comprehensive database: an interactive mapping system of police violence that includes everything from the geographical location and frequency of incidents to the officers and civilians involved.

Description: #TNM is a Music Career Accelerator Program & Music Business Umbrella Made Up of 3 Separate Companies Which Work As One.
Full Description: Section 2.0 Because You Need To Know What We Do. The New Music Movement (also referred to as “#TNM ) is an organization devoted to supporting the needs of musicians throughout the various stages of their careers. From Business services to education with a focus on overall entrepreneurship, the Music Fam, has the expertise and staff in place to create a solid support system for those who have a serious interest in creating a solid stable income  by building a business in the music industry.  From 2012 to date the group has provided, Legal aid,  Managerial Guidance Music Business Consulting (via chat and unlimited one on one calls) Technical and administrative assistance  Content creation Branding  Coding Cataloging Distributribution Copyright Publishing Business Registration Business Management Information on Investment for beginners  Information on planning for retirement Information and assistance  Obtaining Health Care, Housing and other basic needs.   The #TNM Mandatory Education Process, (As Well The Organizations Sponsors Partners & Valuable Resources List), Provide Artist With Easy Access to Education Which May Be Used In real Time To Increase Income:    Online classes available to #TNM Members Include Music Business ( by RenmanMb.com) 50% off  Music Business 101  (by Berkeley School of Music) FREE Production (by Mac Pro) $10 Use of Pro Tools ( by Mac Pro ) $10 Sound Mixing ( by Mac Pro ) $10 Entrepreneurship ( #TNM & Lady Rayne) Free Entrepreneurship 101 ( By Maars) Free Investing for beginners ( By Lady Rayne) Free How To License Your Music (By HTLYM LLC) 30% off Music Publishing ( By Professor Pooch)                   #TNM has also begun to revolutionize the music industry by creating checks and balances which prevent members from falling prey to unethical business practices. We do this by offering the support of professionals which have an extensive amount of experience and real working knowledge of music business law and general practices. Our have spent thousands of working hours advocating on behalf of members. Many artists who come to #TNM Inc have already been swindled by music industry scam artists. At present, we will have to increase funding to achieve the amount of  legal power we truly have need of. However thus far we have used what we have and been successful in regaining rights to publishing and copyright that have been lost by content creators to unethical companies.  In most cases we are able to draw the interest of up and coming professionals providing us the unique opportunity of securing the interest of an artist before they become active in the traditional and/or “mainstream industry”.  Each time a company hears from us and our legal aid department it becomes more clear that there is someone watching that is willing to do something about things. By creating solid relationships with Performance Rights Organizations and joining groups which are important to the overall community which we serve, we have become the Ombudsman of the music Industry.  #TNM has become a safe haven for music artists throughout the world. Musicians no longer have to gamble while seeking out a trusted partner, manager or label. Even artists who are known and have an income can come to us and get a list of “#TNM Tagged Ethical Music Professionals.” Although these artists may not qualify for non-profit assistance, they can still pay full cost for secure services.

Description: The Minimalists is an online platform that provides its readers with essays about living a meaningful life with less stuff.
Full Description: The Minimalists is an online platform that provides its readers with essays about living a meaningful life with less stuff. The platform contributes to people through its online writing classes and private mentoring sessions. In 2011, The Minimalists published its first book, Minimalism: Live a Meaningful Life. The company has established an online audience of more than four million annual readers. Its co-founders have spoken at [Harvard Business School](https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/harvard-business-school), [Apple](https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/apple), and several conferences, as well as many smaller venues, including churches, colleges, corporate groups, libraries, soup kitchens, and various non-profit organizations. In 2014, it published a new book, Everything That Remains, and embarked on a 100-city Everything That Remains Tour. In 2015, The Minimalists published its third book, Essential: Essays by The Minimalists, which presents a minimalist’s perspective on twelve different areas of life, from decluttering, gift-giving, and finances, to passion, health, and relationships. It was launched in 2010 by [Ryan Nicodemus](https://www.crunchbase.com/person/ryan-nicodemus) and [Joshua Fields Millburn](https://www.crunchbase.com/person/joshua-fields-millburn#/entity). It is based in Missoula, Montana.

Description: Doing Good should be fun and rewarding...We make it Awesome!
Full Description: Our Family “The Awesome Pope 5” together created AWESOME A new social network for kindness. Where users can Create,Reward and Join video kindness challenges. It’s like TikTok for kindness.  Creators of Good Content are rewarded for their efforts. AWESOME has created a NEW way for you to show gratitude and instantly be rewarded by your following by receiving kindness koins. Think about if every “like” you ever received was worth 5c. AWESOME created just another way for your friends and fans to show gratitude and love for the content you are creating. Many fans don’t comment or join a video kindness challenge but they would like to show more encouragement and love than the like button provides. Here’s where they can be involved and truly reward you. Some examples of the Kindness Challenges are: Be a parking meter fairy- putting coins in expired parking meters in hopes to help someone you never meet possibly not get a ticket. OR Cupcakes for kindness- make cupcakes and show how you do it and deliver it to a neighbor or someone you just met for the first time.OR Blessings in a bag- create a bag of goodies for our less fortunate friends who are homeless. A tooth brush, tooth paste, water, vitamin-C, cookies or crackers, deodorant, and a note of encouragement and love. Kindness Koins- is a virtual digital currency that users receiving can redeem for gift cards to Groceries and Shopping around the world. Stores like like Amazon, Apple, PlayStation, Starbucks, Target Plus all your favorite restaurants or delivery apps or gift cards to support the dozens of charities listed.(20KK=1$US) To “get more” Kindness Koins for free users can watch rewarded ads or users can purchase as many as they wish in bundles.  As you participate in AWESOME you earn points and level up with your halo growing brighter and changing colors. Exchange points for animated upgrades in the virtual store. Try Inviting friends and followers to join you in a kindness challenge making the world more Awesome, then award them kindness koins. Invite followers to follow from other platforms by gifting kindness koins. There are unlimited opportunities to reward and award the use of the kindness koins. Imagine microfunding charities in fundraising kindness challenges or funding teachers classrooms by celebrating teachers' challenges they share for their class. Churches can help the underprivileged microfunding for materials and food for families in need. Creating AWESOME came After my wife Jill died 3 years ago in a texting-while-driving accident, I was left to navigate raising our 4 children under 10. Making sure my children grow into beautiful kind hearted adults is my greatest goal. These guys are growing up in a digital Social World and I want to help to do everything I can to provide them with the best tools possible, but there are no fun digital tools to create and celebrate kindness. We have seen the strength and empowerment that comes when one person does just one act of kindness, the ripple effect it creates. But how to provide a venue or tool to make it easy to create that ripple effect?   I have owned and operated multiple motels on the Beaches in Florida, a restaurant bar, created a clothing manufacturing company, started 2 different TV shows and a radio show. Plus a multi million dollar Realestate brokerage selling large estates. Now we are seeking partnerships for development and growth to make this platform the most AWESOME Social platform on the planet..

Description: 3DO Company develops and publishes CD-based entertainment software for personal computers and advanced game system consoles.
Full Description: The 3DO Company develops and publishes CD-based entertainment software for personal computers and advanced game system consoles, such as Nintendo 64 and Game Boy Color for Nintendo of America and PlayStation and PlayStation2 for Sony Computer Entertainment.   3DO's popular game brands include Army Men; BattleTanx; Heroes of Might and Magic; High Heat Baseball; and Vegas Games. The company also offers the ""Meridian 59"" series for play over the Internet by subscription.   3DO was founded in 1991 under the name SMSG, Inc. (for San Mateo Software Group) by Electronic Arts founder Trip Hawkins in a partnership with seven companies, including LG, Matsushita (now Panasonic), AT&T Corporation, MCA, Time Warner and Electronic Arts. After 3DO's flagship video game console the 3DO Interactive Multiplayer failed in the marketplace, the company exited the hardware business and became a third-party video game developer. It went bankrupt in 2003 due to poor sales of its games.

Full Description: thatDot is a streaming data platform that explores, acts, and connects on streaming data for workflow and analytic. The platform unlocks the value of streaming data by making it accessible as it is ingested. Their real-time event correlation and workflow engine accelerate new service development and improve user experience, as a foundational element of event-driven software architecture. It accelerates security service development and analyst investigations. thatDot Connect platform uses a powerful graph data model under the hood to surface new value from data connections. It makes it easy to find complex patterns in massive data streams and trigger action immediately. The query for data at any point in time, thatDot Connect tracks the complete change history to quickly answer questions without data replay. thatDot was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Portland, Oregon, USA.

Description: Tetracam produces the world's most efficient and most economical multi-spectral cameras.
Full Description: Tetracam produces the world's most efficient and most economical multi-spectral cameras and the software required to interpret what they see. On farms and ranches throughout the world, Tetracam systems monitor subtle changes in the visible and near-infrared radiation that plants reflect. Growers use this data to spot plants under stress, monitor plant growth or to perform dozens of other functions helpful in managing crops. Variations in the near-infrared indicate changes to vegetation long before any indications appear in the visible spectrum (refer to their System Application Notes for more information on the basic capabilities of their products).

Description: Telller is the best way for you and your friends to capture and collect your shared experiences.
Full Description: Telller is the best way for you and your friends to capture and collect your shared experiences. Invite your friends, combine texts & photos and have fun telling your story together.  Our stories happen with people around us but the way we create and share content is more-or-less one side. Telller solves this simple question - If there is more than one side to every story - why are we always telling them alone? Telller combines the content & conversations of the experiences we share together with friends.  How does it works:  - Create a story and invite your friends to join  - Post text & photos in 1 collaborative story  - Create right when the story is happening or update it later  - Join a friends story to add your version, or follow stories and people you're interested in to stay up to date TELLLER  Tell Together. Tell More.  Coming to the AppStore Spring 2014

Description: Tech Investor News is a news aggregator for investors and professionals who want all their technology sector news in one website.
Full Description: Tech Investor News is an intelligent news aggregator for investors and professionals who want all their technology sector news in one website. It is also a network of single-company news aggregators for each of the top 20 technology stocks. The home tech sector site and company-specific sites each cluster headlines into multiple sub-topic categories, more useful than a single undifferentiated column of search results (example: our Apple site has 23 distinct news categories).  TINâ€™s automated news selection engine uses a process called Intelligent News Search, which uses layers of complex search filters to deliver headline results. The search filters and news source choices that drive this automated process are developed and continually updated by human editors to provide more accurate search results than fully automated systems. Headlines are always updating, all day, every day. The sites auto-refresh every 15 minutes.  Tech Investor News was launched May 28, 2009. The companyâ€™s first beta site, Apple Investor News, was launched in May of 2007 and is now a part of the Tech Investor News network of company-specific aggregation sites. The company also launched Apple|Enthusiast, a news aggregation site focusing solely on Apple product user news, tips and information. Tech Investor News was founded by Frank Cioffi, a former AP radio reporter, television news producer and marketing communications veteran specializing in technology media relations.

Swipecast charges just 10% vs. 40% charged by agencies, by eliminating the "middle man." Swipecast aims to roll up the entire 1099 freelance industry by enabling them to connect directly with each other, view each others' profiles, and book each other over the app. Users get paid in 2 days, vs. 3-5 months, when paid through traditional agencies. The total addressable market globally is about $50 billion, including the "long-tail" of the industry.

Industries: Apps, Photography, Software
Industry Groups: Apps, Content and Publishing, Media and Entertainment, Software
Description: Swing created the #1 App Store app Polaroid Swing and relaunched the iconic Polaroid brand.
Full Description: Swing exited to Microsoft in 2017. It was recognized in the same year by Entrepreneur magazine's Best Entrepreneurial Companies in America awards. Swing’s mission was to reimagine the photograph and the Polaroid brand. Its debut app, SWNG, launched in 2016 through a unique partnership with Polaroid, allows users to create interactive ‘living photos’. The result is a new visual medium to stand alongside photos and videos. SWNG has been featured by Apple as the top featured product on the App Store, and in Apple retail stores across the world.  Apple described Swing's impact on the Polaroid brand in 2016: "Like a photogenic phoenix, Polaroid has risen again. This time around, they’ve ditched physical photos in favor of something a bit like GIFs: playable, rewindable, moving pics. With a swipe or a tilt of your hand, these pictures come to life. It’s hard to explain and irrestibily captivating. Plus, we absolutely adore the authentic old-school feel. After all, it’s Polaroid." Following this digital transformation and relaunch, the Polaroid brand was acquired in 2017. Swing has developed a range of imaging technology across software and hardware, with senior employees recruited from Apple, Instagram and beyond. Based in San Francisco and New York, Swing is backed by top tier investors and individuals including Twitter Co-Founder Biz Stone.

Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Content and Publishing, Hardware, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Software, Video
Description: Next-generation peer-to-peer video content delivery.
Full Description: Streamroot is a market leader in innovative OTT video optimisation technologies for content publishers, network service providers and enterprise customers. At Streamroot, we’re working to overcome one of the biggest challenges facing the internet today: the explosion of video traffic. Our goal is to revolutionise the way we deliver video online, to create more robust, cost-effective infrastructures, and to touch millions of internet users by bringing quality video to every corner of the world. Our core technology - Streamroot DNA™ -  is a crucial foundation for building profitable over-the-top video strategies. An Infrastructure as a Service solution, Streamroot DNA™ harnesses the power of distributed delivery networks to heighten QoE and drastically cut delivery cost.  This ground-breaking technology works by creating a secure mesh network to dynamically and intelligently deliver video streams from the quickest source available, whether it be a user device or a traditional CDN. By multi-sourcing content delivery, Streamroot DNA™ offers viewers lightening-quick streams of higher quality, while providing infinite scale-up potential for the content provider. Priced under a fixed-subscription model, Streamroot DNA™ cuts delivery expenses by between 55 and 85%, helping publishers scale their platforms profitably. No plug-ins, less buffering, lower cost but higher quality - Streamroot’s seamless streaming solutions revolutionise the experience for viewer and provider alike. Streamroot serves high-profile media groups including DailyMotion, Canal+ and Eurosport, enhancing the quality of experience for over 5 million viewers every day. Founded in 2013, the French-American start-up took part in the TechStars Boston accelerator and today benefits from European and US-based VC funding, with offices in both New York and Paris. For access to our services, request a trial through our website www.streamroot.io.  For more information, please visit www.streamroot.io or drop us a line at contact@streamroot.io.

Industries: Content Delivery Network, Cyber Security, Internet, Music Streaming, PaaS, SaaS, Software, Video Streaming
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Information Technology, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio, Privacy and Security, Software, Video
Description: SaaS platform and technologies that puts an end to credential sharing, middle man attacks, and streaming piracy
Full Description: StreamGuard is a technology company that has developed a Utility Patented Technology for controlling bandwidth consumption by preventing third parties from stealing, redistributing, and rebroadcasting multimedia streams. One might wonder why we don’t see more streaming of live events on a paid basis. The reason is because these content providers cannot prevent people from sharing credentials or hijacking and rebroadcasting the streams. This drives the content provider’s bandwidth costs through the roof and turns an otherwise profitable show into a financial disaster. StreamGuard’s technology prevents credential sharing, stream hacking and middle-man attacks. Our tech guarantees an artist or producer that each “view” is paid for and that they are only billed for bandwidth that is generated from those paying customers. Further, preventing pirates from enacting middle-man attacks and stream hacking protects the servers from crashing & overloading.

Description: Stashpix is a location-based photo-sharing application for iPhone users.
Full Description: Stashipix is a photo-sharing application for iOS that allows people to find and leave behind photos wherever they go. Instead of being broadcast over social networks, the photos only appear to Stashpix users at a stash's location -- with one twist: If a user creates or contributes to a stash, he can monitor the contents of the stash from anywhere in the world. Stashes are not tied to a specific list of known places; they're simply based on GPS coordinates and can be named descriptively, creatively, or even arbitrarily. Stashpix is not a social network, and doesn't rely on any others. There is no need to log in, create an account, or give up personal information. It's simply a way for people to quickly find and leave behind photos wherever they go. Be sure to watch the 52-second video at www.stashpix.com for an entertaining overview of the app and its uses. The creative possibilities are endless.

Description: Video recording for the touch generation
Full Description: Use Spotliter and your unique touch to record extraordinary high-definition videos. Spotliter introduces new “touch effects” which allow you to tap, slide or pinch your fingers on the camera screen to “spotlite” specific areas of your video.  These unique effects enable you to tap or slide your finger to MAGNIFY a friend’s’ face, FREEZE just one object while the rest of the screen continues moving or highlight just one area of the screen in color while the rest is in black and white with B&W2COLOR. Exactly how a touchscreen camera should work. You can apply effects, switch from effect to effect and even switch between front and back cameras while recording. You can also pause, adjust and restart recording to compose the perfect video. Produce 6-second videos or capture an entire event. Your videos are only limited by the storage on your device and your imagination. Spotliter introduces 12 unique touch effects. These include Magnify, Freeze, B&W2Color and Searchlight, which were early favorites of beta users. With Spotliter, you can: * select the B&W2Color effect to spotlite a taxicab driving across the camera screen in color while the rest of the screen appears black and white, simply by tapping on the cab and sliding your finger as it moves; * select Magnify and magnify just your friend’s face singing in a recital while the rest of the group appears at normal zoom; * select Freeze and, while recording your daughter playing softball, tap the screen to freeze just her swing as she hits the ball while the rest of the screen and game records in regular motion.  Then simply double-tap the screen to stop the freeze effect; * produce 6-second videos or capture an entire event. Your videos are only limited by the storage on your device and your imagination. Spotliter videos are saved to the device's Photos gallery so you may view, trim, and share Spotliter videos like any other video * apply effects, switch effects, and switch between front and back cameras all while recording. You can also pause, position the touch effect and restart recording to compose the perfect video. Download Spotliter from the iTunes App Store at: http://appstore.com/spotlitervideo  Use the hashtag #spotliter to share videos publicly so that Spotliter can discover and feature them on www.spotliter.com or at www.facebook.com/Spotliter.   Spotliter is optimized for the iPhone 5S, 5C, 5, 4S, 4 and the iPod Touch 3 and 4 and 5. Designed and developed by netomat, Inc., a pioneering company in mobile video and web technologies, Spotliter is the first video recording app built to take full advantage of the latest touch-enabled smartphones with chipsets capable of sophisticated video processing.

Industries: Big Data, Communities, Information Technology, News, Publishing, Software
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Content and Publishing, Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Media and Entertainment, Software
Description: Spoke Intelligence Network or SpokeIntel is the new source for timely, relevant and comprehensive information on industries
Full Description: Spoke Intelligence Network or SpokeIntel is the new source for timely, relevant and comprehensive information on industries, industry trends, companies and people— designed from the ground up to meet the needs of business managers, sales, and research professionals. Launching with an initial database of over 20,000 entities across multiple industries, SpokeIntel helps drive businesses forward with its robust crowd-sourced data gathering model, paired with automatically-updated enterprise-specific news. Business professionals turn to Spoke in search of the latest company information, including executive profiles, company milestones, industry trends, news, blog posts, and much more. VBProfiles also allows business professionals to create user-friendly profiles of companies and people in a smooth and organized process that replaces existing inefficient data gathering techniques. Profiles are shared with the community at large, including peers, partners and industry experts – all able to interact and collaborate to create relevant insights about people, companies, industries and trends. What makes us different? The Spoke Intelligence Network provides a 360 degree view of an industry, industry trends, a company and its people from all the information available on the internet — no more spending hours Googling for all the different information you need on a company. Ultimately such a view across thousands of businesses enables professionals to derive insights and drive business around an industry, a trend, a company and people. Most importantly, The Spoke Intelligence Network is community-based. We believe that information on the Internet shouldn’t be simply limited to what people publish about themselves. We envisioned a collaborative space where communities can respectfully interact around companies and people outside the control of those companies and people. The Spoke Intelligence Network will become the premier network for this kind of vibrant community. We are curating information by giving the community at large the power to update profiles and provide insights. We have created a moderation platform to provide enough oversight to ensure that community-provided content is appropriate. Our focus is business information, so this will not be the venue for airing customer support issues or maligning someone’s reputation. We are doing this in partnership with companies and individuals. In compliance with our privacy policy, individuals are able to opt-out of their profile at any time. And, is doesn’t stop there. We’re regularly aggregating additional third-party information. Over time our profiles will continue to evolve with a current mix of community-supplied and third-party relevant public information.

Full Description: Softcover is a new self-publishing toolchain and publishing platform allowing authors to write a book once, and publish in HTML, EPUB, MOBI, and PDF formats directly for sale on the Softcover site — all with a single command.  Softcover lets authors take advantage of the proven production system and business model used by the Ruby on Rails Tutorial, including selling ebooks, multimedia premiums, and the option to make a free online version available to users. The Softcover ebook production system is available as open-source software, so authors aren’t locked in to a proprietary system. Using that tool-chain, authors can build multi-format ebooks (HTML, EPUB, MOBI, and PDF) from common source files and upload them to Softcover’s integrated sales platform.

Industries: Advertising, Apps, Blogging Platforms, Internet, Small and Medium Businesses, Social Media, Software
Industry Groups: Advertising, Apps, Content and Publishing, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Other, Sales and Marketing, Software
Description: Social Media & Web Marketing for SMB
Full Description: SOCIOPAL Makes Facebook, Twitter and Blog Marketing Manageable for Small Businesses. SOCIOPAL introduces a social marketing application that allows small business owners to decrease time spent on social networking and blogging to minutes per week. SOCIOPAL algorithm prioritizes marketing activities. New York (PRWEB) June 05, 2013 SOCIOPAL (http://www.sociopal.com) has introduced a social marketing application that enables small businesses to manage multiple social media sites in just minutes per week. Social media is vital for small businesses to grow, but with so many different social networks, keeping up with the various accounts can be overwhelming and time-consuming. It can also be a daunting task to develop a successful strategy on what to post and how to get more followers. “Small businesses need corporate-level expertise in their marketing endeavors, but rarely have the resources to get it,” said Tamar Shor, CEO of SOCIOPAL. In its easy-to-use, free application, SOCIOPAL has incorporated a prioritization algorithm that guides small business owners on what, when and where they should be publishing and posting to social networks to be successful; while simultaneously monitoring online activity to determine and enhance their future marketing efforts. “The aim of this algorithm,” explained Shor, “is to optimize social marketing through ensuring quality and diverse posting and balancing both where and when posts appear. At the end of the day, small business owners want to focus on their business, not social networking, and SOCIOPAL helps them keep up with what the enterprise level players are doing online without sacrificing everything else.” SOCIOPAL allows small businesses access to advanced marketing tools such as pre-sourced content and scheduling features, which aid small business owners in calendaring professional posts to their Facebook Page, Twitter account and Blog. Nicholas Singer, owner of FITology in Washington D.C. is using SOCIOPAL to manage his online marketing, “I understood the importance of Internet marketing but was overwhelmed with the upkeep of multiple sites. SOCIOPAL helped me to improve my Internet presence while only devoting minutes per week to the project.” SOCIOPAL integrates Facebook, Twitter, and a personal Website & Blog into one seamless application that proposes content and marketing strategies for small businesses. The new application, according to Shor, promises greater efficiency and personalization while minimizing the time small business owners spend working on marketing. About SOCIOPAL SOCIOPAL was founded on the belief that while every small business needs to market via Facebook, Twitter and a personalized Website & Blog, no small business can afford to hire a social marketing expert to do it. Enter SOCIOPAL, a simple, free solution that guides you through the process and keeps your sites fresh in minutes per week. Visit http://www.sociopal.com to find out more. Contact: Tamar Shor is the CEO of SOCIOPAL, the free tool that gets your small business on Facebook, Twitter and a Website & Blog within minutes! Connect on Facebook and Twitter.
