Description: SmugMug is a photo sharing website that allows its users to store, share and sell their photos online. They also own & operate Flickr.
Full Description: SmugMug is not your typical Web 2.0 photo sharing site. It's not free, there are no ads, the company is self funded, and has been profitable for over three years. SmugMug is geared more towards professional photographers with features such as watermarking, selling downloads and prints, and creating galleries of photos. Users can even use their own domain names for these galleries. SmugMug still has the more typical Web 2.0 photo sharing features like RSS feeds, tags, and a public API. More recently, SmugMug has added functionality to automatically scale the size of photos to the viewing size of the browser. Smug also supports HD quality video uploading. Competitors include: [Flickr](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/flickr), [Photobucket](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/Photobucket), [Webshots](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/webshots), [Fotki](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/fotki), [BubbleShare](http://www.techcrunch.com/2006/04/06/the-photo-gunners/#comment-25698), [Zenfolio](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/Zenfolio), [Zoomr](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/zooomr), and [Facebook](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/facebook).

Description: Slide enables users to create and personalize widgets and use them on social networks, blogs and desktops.
Full Description: Slide, founded by PayPal co-founder Max Levchin, makes widgets that help people express themselves.  The company took a big risk in 2006 when they gave users the ability to auto-insert slide shows into their MySpace pages and blasting bulletins out to all their friends. They did this by asking users to hand over their MySpace credentials, and doing all the hard work for them. This is a clear violation of MySpace's terms of service, though, and most people expected Slide to receive a cease and desist letter and/or get access turned off. But that never happened, and Slide's big bet has paid off.  Slide has since evolved to offer a number of widgets.  Users create and personalize widgets on Slide.com and can then use them on social networks, blogs and desktops. According to comScore Slide has more than 117 million unique monthly viewers.  Slide also claims more than 200,000 new Slide Shows are added to the Slide Network each day.

Description: SkyJuke is a software company developing music apps for mobile devices.
Full Description: SkyJuke is a new app for iOS and Android that allows you and your friends to share and stream music to each other via a WiFi Network.  With SkyJuke, users add their songs to a shared playlist that everyone can listen to. SkyJuke features two types of play methods to suit your needs: Group Play and Party Play. With Group Play, SkyJuke plays the “now playing” song out of all connected smartphones at the same time. Instead of sharing earbuds, SkyJuke lets you share and experience music with your friends with your own smartphone. This play method is ideal for a couple on a plane who want to listen to the same song together or for a group of friends on a crowded subway. And with Party Play, the “now playing” song from the shared playlist plays out of only one smartphone. Now, the host of a party can have his or her guests contribute to the music, or a coffee shop can give its customers the ability to control the music that is playing inside. Smartphones with Wi-Fi Direct can use SkyJuke without a wireless router. This comes in handy so you can have SkyJuke playing music while on a road trip or camping with friends. SkyJuke also allows users to create profiles, vote songs to the top or out of the playlist, text chat within the app, and ban undesirable users from the SkyJuke network.  Download SkyJuke so you can share, stream and discover music with your friends…or complete strangers…in real life.

Industries: Communities, Content, Ediscovery, File Sharing, Internet, Mobile, Music, News, Real Time
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Content and Publishing, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Music and Audio, Other, Software
Description: SkyGrid offers a platform that provides web-scale infrastructure to help people connect with things they are passionate about.
Full Description: SkyGrid is a real-time web service that keeps people up-to-date on the things they care about. It is located in Sunnyvale, California and is operated and privately owned by SkyGrid, Inc.  In April 2010, SkyGrid launched on the Apple iPad with an application to browse and share streams of news. People use SkyGrid to receive updates on trending news and to follow their personal interests.  SkyGrid's name comes from the combining the word "Sky" representing a vast limitless space and "Grid" a simple way to organize an unlimited amount of information. SkyGrid was founded by Kevin Pomplun, in 2005 when he was 22 years old.  SkyGrid began building technology to create a way for people to see what information was traveling the fastest. As a result of this, Pomplun invented Information Velocity and was issued a United States Patent Aug 23, 2007. SkyGrid began as a real-time search service, then licensed it to the financial market, and now has returned to its original use to provide updates on information people are interested in.  In January 2011, SkyGrid announced the launch of SkyGrid Groups; a service that connects people with the music artists, brands, and public figures they are passionate about.   Groups is a new social forum; connecting the conversations people are having all over the web — on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, and hundreds of other places — in one place.  For ex, music artists use Groups to connect with fans who are excited about an upcoming show. Brands use Groups to connect with customers who are excited about a new product. Public figures use Groups to connect with voters who are excited about akey issue in their community. Even humanitarian causes are now using Groups to connect with people who want to help.

Industries: Hardware, Internet, iOS, Telecommunications, Video, Video Streaming
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Hardware, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Platforms, Software, Video
Description: Sivoo provides IT infrastructure for IP video.
Full Description: Sivoo provides IT infrastructure for IP video, and has created a digital-media asset management solution to intake, encode, distribute, and monetize video across distribution channels including Internet, mobile, IPTV, and cable using Internet protocol (IP). This solution is called CEDR, which is an acronym describing the life-cycle of IP-managed video (Capture, Encode, Distribute, and Report). CEDR leverages what we call "cluster-in-cloud computing" in order to radically transform this life-cycle from a cost-intensive, geographically specific, and hardware-dependent process to a cost efficient, decentralized, and software based process that resides in the "cloud." CEDR has been developed by SIVOO and is proprietary to the Company. CEDR creates digital video assets from any format or source including Satellite, Internet stream, hard media, or digital file; encodes captured video into any and/or multiple specifications like CableLabs, Flash, Windows Media, Quicktime, H.264, MPEG2, etc.; distributes these assets to any IP video or broadcast distribution outlet; and tracks the views and monetization of assets in a single report. With CEDR, video assets are easily and automatically managed and distributed by and between MSOs, content aggregators, and distribution outlets. CEDR allows customers to pull video assets between locations as either a file or as a stream-link on the Internet Edge. CEDR can also push video assets to Internet sites like YouTube and MetaCafe, mobile platforms like Verizon V-Cast, IPTV providers like Verizon FIOS TV and Verismo, and cable companies like Comcast. CEDR distribution outlets include AOL, Brightcove, Charter Communications, eyespot, Grouper, Guba, HotWire, iFilm, iTunes Podcasts, Joost, jumpcut, JumpTV, MediaMelon, MetaCafe, MobiTV, MySpace, SES Americom, Terra, Verismo, Verizon FIOS TV, Verizon V-Cast, Videoegg, Vimeo, VOY, VSocial, and YouTube. SIVOO is actively growing its distribution reach. SIVOO earns fees from processing video through CEDR and shares in the advertising revenue generated by views across CEDR distribution outlets.

Description: Creator of the SipLink spontaneous meetup app, that enables people with common interests to chat, meet and build real friendships.
Full Description: SipLink is a spontaneous meetup app that makes it easier for people with common interests to chat, meet and build friendships.  SipLink works by users submitting location sensitive posts. Posts represent a variety of conversation topics.  Some ways people are using SipLink are: - Your best friend lives far away? Find someone with common interest in your neighborhood that you can talk to. - New in town? Find a friend who could help you to integrate into the new environment. - Looking for your soulmate? Your SipLink profile is more than just a face shot. Have meaningful conversations in the safe confines of your favorite coffee shop. - Looking for a playdate? Find other moms and dads in your neighborhood. - Trying to learn a new language? Find fellow language speakers locally and practice together at your favorite coffee shop. - International? SipLink allows you to find and connect with your compatriots locally. - Looking for a study partner? Use SipLink to connect and study at your local coffee shop. - Are you a freelancer? Use SipLink to connect with potential clients at coffee shop you prefer to work out of. - Interested in board games? Find partners to play with at local coffee shops. Main features of the application: 1. Post to start conversations with other SipLink users What is it that you want to talk about? Creating new posts lets other people know what interests you at this moment. Since your new posts will be immediately visible to other people in your local area, adding posts is the best way to start the process of making connections within the app. When you add a post, you can select the coffee shop that you would like to meet at and you can say what is on your mind. You can also skip specifying a coffee shop in which case the post will originate from your approximate current location. 2. Browse nearby posts from people looking to meet over coffee Nearby posts lets you see what people are interested in talking about in your local area. By browsing posts you will be able to find people you may want to meet. The most recent and geographically closest posts are displayed to you. You can scroll down to see older posts and you can use pull down refresh to see new post activity. When you add your own posts they will be immediately visible to other people in your local area.  Each post shows you: some details about the user who made the post; the coffee shop where they would like to meet, its address and distance from you; when the post was made and what the person is looking to talk about.  3. Check profiles of people you could meet By entering profile information about yourself you give other people an idea who you are and what your interests may be. By browsing the profiles of other people you can learn more about them, which will help you decide if chatting with them or meeting at your local coffee shop would be worthwhile. In the profiles view, you can: add pictures to your profile; specify information about yourself; and specify your name and age. 4. Chat with people Chatting with other users within SipLink is a convenient way to meet new people. For example, if you see a post that is interesting, you can chat with the person who made the post. Chatting with other users within SipLink is a convenient way to coordinate when and where you might meet. For example, you would like to meet a person who made a given post so you chat with them to work out the details of at which coffee shop and what time to meet. Chatting with other users within SipLink is a convenient way to maintain connections you have made. For example, you have connected with several people through SipLink and you can chat with them to plan future meetings or simply to touch base or keep your conversation going.

Description: Premium Managed WordPress Hosting
Full Description: High-Performance Development, Hosting & Management for Creatives SiphonLabs is a high-performance, cloud-based development, hosting and management platform for creatives that is launching from the SoftLayer Catalyst Startup Program. It supports multiple content management software (CMS) platforms and will evolve to include additional CMS and ecommerce solutions that will enable developers, designers and agencies to manage website development across a range of platforms and host live websites for themselves or their clients, all from a single, intuitive dashboard. The SiphonLabs platform simplifies development, maintenance and hosting processes, freeing creatives to focus on what they do best—designing and developing great websites. Two of the most popular CMS platforms, WordPress and MODX, will be available at launch. An ecommerce solution, potentially Magento, is likely to become the third option, with Drupal and Joomla! following. Built around innovative “Siphon” processes, tasks that have traditionally required a reasonable level of technical skill and have taken hours, sometimes days, can now be completed in a fraction of the time, freeing users to focus on their core design and development activities.  What are the Key Platform Features? - One cloud solution with multiple site-building options. - Ability to launch, clone, move, share and test sites in seconds with the Snapshot feature. - 7-day rolling automatic backups for both development and live sites, with access to restores from the dashboard 24/7. - Collaboration with clients and other users by connecting accounts to manage and share cloud sites and development activities. - Intuitive dashboard that reduces complexity to a handful of clicks and is easy to use for all technical levels. - Highly secure, blazingly quick clouds on high-spec infrastructure with hosting options in multiple global datacenters (North America and Europe available at launch). - Software-specific support and knowledge available through SiphonLabs "Cloud Coaches" (support team). - Value-added services such as domain purchasing, email mailbox purchasing and setup, and SSL certificate purchasing and management, will be introduced later this year.

Description: Founded as CampusBookRentals, we aim to deliver significant value to students through partnerships in college bookstores and online.
Full Description: We were founded as CampusBookRentals in the summer of 2007 by a college student who couldn't make sense of textbook prices, and the inefficiencies that seemed to be driving them up. He proposed that renting textbooks might be part of the answer. The concept took off, creating one of the fastest growing companies in America and forever changing the rules of the ten billion dollar higher education content industry.  In the fall of 2009, we became the first to bring textbook rentals right to the campus itself through an innovative store partnership that delivered real value to students and the store. In December 2012, after nearly a year of joint development, we acquired a full campus retail and warehouse management platform, sometimes referred to as a point of sale, and branded the technology Sidewalk Pro. Now our full suite of college store retail solutions fall under the Sidewalk umbrella. Description: Sharetronix is an open-source micro blogging platform that enables users to exchange ideas and multimedia in real time.
Full Description: Sharetronix (aka Blogtronix) was initially founded by Vassil Mladjov in 2005 as Blogtronix, LLC. As one of the pioneers in the social business software space, Blogtronix was met with considerable adoption as a "custom content delivery and collaboration portal." After several years of focusing entirely on the Enterprise market by building white label platforms to spec for some of the largest global companies (in telecommunications, finance, and news) Blogtronix released a new version in 2009 which allowed for simple plug and play installations in either a software or SaaS configuration. Later in that same year, Edno23 was acquired, and a robust microblogging platform was introduced to the world, which has since received over 50,000 downloads. Today, with over 30,000 communities in 170 countries, Blogtronix has adopted the new moniker of Sharetronix, which better reflects our overall mission of allowing our users to more easily share information without being encumbered. In pursuit of our dual-pronged goal to both expand into new verticals within the Enterprise space, as well as encourage adoption among smaller sized teams, divisions, and SMBs, we have assembled a new management team and brought in expertise from both the professional services and financial realms. Moving forward for 2012, we intend to continue to deliver top-notch products for organizations of all focuses and sizes.

Full Description: The Social Marketing landscape becomes more and more complicated for brands on a daily basis, and at the core of the challenge, is the MASSIVE need for good content. Brands now need 20X+ the amount of content that they did five years ago, and finding and publishing that content is a daunting task. This three-step, legally secure process provides brands with the ability to not only connect with users who are talking about them, but also to gain access to relevant content that is real and trustworthy.  Outside of the initial offering, ShareRoot has developed an easy to use system to organize your content which allows for brands to display their newly owned content in a variety of ways. These include showcasing your content on a social wall, utilizing them in hashtag campaigns, having your images appear on a television or jumbotron, through a Facebook integration that allows for a custom gallery to appear, and many more. You can even stream images from a live event directly onto a screen at that event!  At ShareRoot we believe in building out a product that our clients will want to use. It is this basic belief that drives our team and molds what direction and path our product takes. We also believe that brands should harness the visual power of their consumers and grow authentic, unparalleled connections through visual content marketing.

Description: SetLife is a social media app that helps people seize the day.
Full Description: SetLife is the Carpe Diem app, a social network designed to share perfect moments. Users can “set their scene” with a picture and a caption. Then simultaneously tag the weather, the location, the friends they’re with, what they’re reading, watching, listening to, eating, drinking and/or wearing. In just one glimpse, SetLife moments show the beauty of the lifestyle scenery of perfect moments. SetLife differentiates itself in the simultaneous tagging of the elements of a positive experience, as no other social platform is designed to do so (SetLife is patent pending).   Driving to San Francisco in a red convertible while listening to Lana Del Rey and wearing Raybans. Relaxing on the beach, Havaianas, a straw hat and The Old Man and The Sea. A fireplace, a glass of Pinot, the snow outside and Miles Davis playing in the background.   SetLife is for when you see yourself from above and want to take a picture. But it’s not just about the picture, it’s more about what’s around you in that moment. SetLifers can share their lifestyle and peek into their friends’ favorite moments. They can look for similar perfect moments and find people that share their idea of bliss. As in real life, users can inspire others based on their tastes in books, food, fashion, movies, etc.

Description: Sergian Technologies is the developer of Latch, a smartphone application that allows users to sign in to any website simply and securely.
Full Description: Latch begins by revolutionizing Web logins. We envision a world where accessing protected websites is not only pain-free but more secure than current mechanisms. Instead of username/password challenges, smart phones will authenticate users automatically and securely. Instead of creating, remembering, forgetting, recovering and rotating tens of unique username password combinations, Latch users will create only a handful of identities based on personas tied to unique email addresses, e.g. personal, work and hobby. This mechanism is more secure because auto-generated credentials and never seen by people or even shared with websites. Latch accounts give users a convenient and secure passport to the Web. Websites will benefit by converting more visitors to engaged participants and paying customers, since the user avoids having to create yet another account. Building on this base, a Latch account then evolves into an identity store, containing contact and payment information that users authorize websites to access. Users recognize convenience and higher security by having this managed from a single app. Websites benefit with higher conversion rates.

Description: Mobile and Web Connection Platform for People, Places and Events
Full Description: SeeYouThen new app is all about connecting people, places and events.  Its a social platform that allows you to connect with friends, but the real unique aspect is the ability to connect to places and events in real-time.  Whether you created the SeeYouThen Exchange or SYTE for short or you join one, you can connect and share with Who's There! SeeYouThen is all about connecting with friends and groups of friends.  You can join or create cool and unique virtual connection points called Exchanges or SYTES for short. - INVITE YOUR FRIENDS. I know… not another social network. Group Chatting is ok, but why not create a cool space just for that group that needs to be connected. - CREATE EXCHANGES FOR GROUPS OF PEOPLE, PLACES, AND EVENTS.  Connect your groups, favorite places, and especially events ( big or small) (A Wedding to a Saturday night out with friends). It takes under a minute to create a new exchange (syte). - DIRECT MESSAGES If you have an internet connection you can send messages to your friends. No need to worry about your SMS plans, just chat directly with friends.. - PHOTOs MIXER Stay in the mix with your friends’ photos as they post. But wait, you can also filter friend’s photos. You can still be friends, but not have to see all their photos all the time. You know the ones. - ACTIVITY WALL (ALL ACTIVITY AND EXCHANGES) Your wall keeps you in the loop of what is going on across all exchanges that you have created or joined. - NOTIFICATIONS You decide how you want to be notified. Just go to notification preferences and turn on the activities that you want to know about right away and those that you don’t. You're in control. Let’s get started and get connecting! Download the app, then the first stop is to join SeeYouThen’s exchange to keep up on all the updates and what we’re up to.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence, Photography, Productivity Tools, Social, Software
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Community and Lifestyle, Content and Publishing, Data and Analytics, Media and Entertainment, Science and Engineering, Software
Description: Making photos smart and useful.
Full Description: At SeeSnap, we make photos smart and useful! Humans use vision to discover problems, how to fix them, and confirm that they have been solved. Why isn't there a software solution that does the same? After interviewing problem-solvers across many industries, we found that the market is looking for an intuitive, asset-light, capital-efficient application that’s easy to understand and use. The result: reduced costs, improved productivity, and valuable insights across all types of workflows. Our team of INC 500 founders, PhDs, and developers have developed such a visual-based, AI-powered application that can be used across all devices. We call it SeeSnap. SeeSnap makes photos smart and useful so any team can work better together with less confusion. Identify problems, communicate them and solve them without relying on lengthy text descriptions or checklists. Your team and your customers can even communicate in-platform. Our AI automatically scans snaps for information, and each snap contains all the information you need to get the job done. Workflows can be managed from anywhere, on any device. We believe any problem can be solved in three simple steps: See it: Your eyes work faster than any productivity app, and SeeSnap takes advantage of this. To get started, all you have to do it see the problem. Snap it: Snap the problem and let SeeSnap’s AI scan the image instantly. Add any annotations, description, due dates, assign to a team member, and more. All of this is done with a few taps within a snap so that you have all the information you need. Description: Section is an Edge Compute Platform that enables engineers to run any workload, anywhere, underpinned by modern DevOps principles.
Full Description: Section is an Edge Compute Platform that enables engineers to run any workload, anywhere, underpinned by modern DevOps principles. It now has offices in both Sydney, Australia, and Boulder, Colorado, and is backed by major Venture Capital groups including Foundry Group and Techstars Ventures. The Section team is comprised of dedicated individuals who come from diverse backgrounds in engineering, agile development, marketing, sales, and product. Section's industry-leading edge compute platform gives engineers the flexibility and control to run any workload, anywhere, underpinned by modern DevOps principles. With its container-based (Docker/Kubernetes) approach to HTTP traffic delivery, the platform includes an extensive library of highly available and highly performant edge compute modules that can be deployed anywhere along the edge continuum, including the ability to build/bring your own edge containers. Section operates across the HTTP delivery path from origin to distributed network, is hosting provider-agnostic (cloud, on-premise, self-hosted), and has already been proven to address challenges far beyond traditional CDN workloads. Section was founded in Australia in 2012 and moved its headquarters to the US in 2016.

Description: View, search, organize, and share your news and social media. One inbox for all your stuff.
Full Description: Scruddle simplifies how you view, search, organize, and share your social updates, news, and email. Unlike traditional, curated news, Scruddle allows users to find the news they want to see, then organize those stories and headlines based on their own preferences, with funnels. Users can switch between these funnels freely, based on the type of news and information they want to view, when they want to view it. Moreover, Scruddle integrates with Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, and LinkedIn, to share the stories users have found, as well as allowing updates from Facebook, Twitter, and Tumblr to flow into their Scruddle Inbox with other stories and headlines. Scruddle is free to use, providing social profile integration, news subscriptions, and even custom news feeds and email. Scruddle Premium is a paid subscription, offering more features and benefits, and removing ads from the apps and website. Scruddle was launched as a public beta in 2013, with the public website launch in 2014. Scruddle Inbox for Android was released for Google Play in August 2016, and Scruddle Inbox for iOS was released on the Apple App Store in November 2016.

It conducts web-based seminars, podcasts, and provides video clips, interactive sessions, images and slide shows related to its information and articles.   Science Magazine was founded in 1880 by Thomas Edison, based in Washington, District of Columbia. Description: ScanDigital enables consumers to convert their photos, slides, negatives, albums, and videos into digital formats.
Full Description: ScanDigital provides a service to help consumers convert old photos, slides, negatives, photo albums, videos and movie film into digital format.   When customers place an order with ScanDigital, they simply set up an account at www.scandigital.com and the service will automatically generate a UPS shipping label to send images and video to their headquarters.  Photos are scanned and then individually cropped, oriented and color-corrected. The service also removes dust, minor scratches, blemishes and red eyes.  Videos are transferred to digital and then reviewed for quality. The digitized images and video are returned on CD, DVD or a hard drive along with the originals, usually within a week after the materials are received at ScanDigital.  Image files are also uploaded to a free online gallery for viewing, sharing, and purchasing reprints as well as mugs, key chains, greeting cards, t-shirts, and other merchandise. Customers can also upload images directly to their gallery from a digital camera and computer to unite  new and old images for one seamless photo archive.   ScanDigital also sells Digital Photo Frames which can be preloaded by the Company with newly digitized images.  The Company has developed a unique Slideshow creation tool which allows users to have more control over the customization of a digital slideshow, but removes the time intensive, technical work.   Prices start at $0.48 for each color photo at 300 dpi, with resolutions up to 4,000 dpi available. The service can handle black and white and color photos on printed paper as well as 35 mm negatives, 35 mm slides, APS film and photo albums.  All materials are digitized domestically. This ensures that handling is fast and secure, quality remains high, and materials won't be lost in transit.

Our software gives users control over their VR experiences by providing the audio/visual best vantage points to create an emotional connection with the content. Further, our proprietary audio capture and delivery software gives users an unprecedented level of control to customize their viewing experiences and control their point of view through interface design inputs such as touch, gamepad, positional tracking or “gaze”. The audio algorithm of our player delivers streaming and pre-recorded 360º stereo and binaural audio specifically designed to create user-centered audio experiences. Our proprietary system  uses a combination of discrete audio inputs and mobile audio post-processing to create unique experiences that match the head position of the end user. The VR software pipeline will start at localized machines at live venues capturing VR content into a cloud infrastructure where additional audio/video processing will occur for delivery through a custom app developed for iOS and Android mobile devices.

Description: Rollr is based out of beautiful Tampa, FL, yet most of the development has taken place in San Pedro Sula.
Full Description: Rollr is the simplest and most professional way to publish content on the web.   Founded in Tampa, FL, Rollr was created as a tool for the average person to have a presence on the web.  Rollr is technically a blog tool, but it also bridges the gap between blogging and social networks.  With Rollr a user can post long detailed articles, quick status updates, great looking photos, and more.  All of this gets posted to a completely personalized, professional looking webpage free from branding, ads, and other annoyances.   Another important feature of Rollr is how easily it integrates with Facebook and Twitter.  All posts are optionally shared to the user's Facebook feed and tweeted to their followers.  This allows the users to keep some posts completely private or share some posts with the world.  Either way the post will be saved on a great looking site. Finally, in order to post frequently and easily, Rollr came out with a very simple mobile application.  The application is available for both Android and iPhone, and it ensures that the users are able to update their websites easily.   Right now, development is done in San Pedro Sula, Honduras as the co-founder/developer lives there.  One of Rollr's goals is to be able to produce an influential and profitable company that can help sustain missionary work in Honduras and other parts of the world.

Description: Roll Call is a media company that provides news, objective facts and analysis, and coverage of elections and the politics of legislation.
Full Description: Roll Call is a media company that provides news, objective facts and analysis, and coverage of elections and the politics of legislation. Roll Call’s publications offer coverage on various policy areas such as agendas, entitlements, judiciary, aging, environment, labor, agriculture, financial services, land use, appropriations, foreign policy, leadership, budget, government contracting, pensions, commerce, government operations, science and technology, consumer protection, health, small business, homeland security, space, defense, housing, taxes, economy, humanity, telecommunications, education, immigration, trade, transitions, emergency management, infrastructure, transportation, energy, intelligence, and veterans affairs. In addition, the company offers CongressNow, a legislative wire service; Briefing Room, a centralized policy and document intelligence service; and GalleryWatch, a bill and document-tracking service.Its online and offline products include a congressional directory; CapwizXC, an online grassroots advocacy suite; and Knowlegis, a collection of online tools that provide legislative data. The company offers legislative tracking solutions that cover and analyze various legislative actions in the Congress; online advocacy solutions that deliver legislative intelligence and tools to help users manage and mobilize their memberships; and news, insights, and analysis about the Congress, politics, and governments. Roll Call also provides books and directories that offer coverage of congressional representatives as well as provides background information about committee assignments, vote studies, key votes, election results, and more. The company’s clients span the policy-making arena ranging from congressional offices, federal departments, and agencies to major corporations, associations, law and lobbying firms, the media, and academia as well as people and institutions that make and shape public policies. Roll Call was founded in 1955 and is based in Washington, District of Columbia. It operates as a subsidiary of The Economist Newspaper Group, Inc.

Description: RIB focuses on the development of technology solutions for the construction industry and offers iTWO, iTWOcx, and iTWOfm.
Full Description: RIB Software is an innovator in the construction business. The company creates, develops, and offers iTWO³ – new thinking, new working method and new technology – for construction projects across various industries worldwide. iTWO today is the world’s first Cloud / License based big data 5D BIM enterprise solution for construction companies, industrial companies, developers and investors. Since its inception in 1961, RIB Software has been the pioneer in construction innovation, exploring and bringing in new thinking, new working methods and new technology to enhance construction productivity, and transform the construction industry into the most advanced and digitalized industry in the 21st century. RIB iTWO is a fully integrated solution spanning over the whole life cycle of asset creation projects, with an interactive Building Information Model (BIM)-based graphic process which integrates planning and execution phases from end to end. iTWO integrates traditional estimating, packaging, controlling and execution, revolutionary 5D capabilities (3D Integrated model + time + cost) and project collaboration into a single software platform. According to leading clients, consultants and contractors, the future lies in virtual construction management. iTWO enables you to improve the quality and cost-effectiveness of your projects in all phases.

Full Description: REVEALiO bridges the sentimental value of a physical greeting card with the amazing virtual power of augmented reality. Tradition meets technology. The recipient can, with a touch of a button, share the card on Social Media, reply via text or email, visit company website, buy tickets, RSVP, add event to calendar, etc… There is SO MUCH POWER in a REVEALiO, it benefits sender and recipient equally.

Description: Remote GeoSystems is a technology company that designs and builds geospatial video recording systems and mapping software.
Full Description: At Remote GeoSystems we solve the challenges in capturing, displaying and managing large volumes of geotagged video and “Full Motion Video” (FMV).  In simpler words, we make it easy for manned and unmanned vehicles to record and put GPS-tagged video and other visual data on a map showing their movement in both real-time and after the event. We are a geospatial software and hardware company offering patent-pending turnkey solutions to easily record, map, report, archive & search “moving-track” geotagged videos, photos and other location-based project files. Our products include the industry-first, geoDVR™ (geospatial video geospatial recorder) and LineVision™ suite of software. Unlike traditional video recording systems, our rugged geoDVRs log GPS and permanently embed the video with this important location and time data. Post-mission, our LineVision video mapping and inspection reporting software provides users with simple but powerful tools for geographic video analysis, editing and project packaging while leveraging existing Geographic Information Systems (GIS). These capabilities allow for more efficient and accurate data collection and the creation of reusable aerial and ground-based survey and inspection work-products across a broad range of industries including: Unmanned Vehicles, Aerospace & Aviation, Electric Utilities, Oil & Gas, Rail Transportation, Defense & Security, Professional Survey & Mapping and Natural Resources Management. We offer both complete hardware & software packages and individual components based on your specific data collection project needs including commercial-off-the-shelf (COTS) and custom designed systems. Remote GeoSystems is based in beautiful Fort Collins, Colorado, USA at the foothills of the Rocky Mountains.

Description: Transcription & Searchable Captions
Full Description: Provides instant access and searchability to the spoken word, through realtime transcription, captioning services and fully searchable video.  Realtime Transcription's tag line is "Capturing Business at the Speed of Sound."  The company provides streaming realtime transcription for live events such as online meetings, webinars, conferences, classes, live broadcast events, press releases and other time-sensitive events.  They also offer transcription of archived audio and video files.  Immediate transcription of video, with time codes, for fast video editing is a specialty of this company, and they provide this service to various media companies.   Through their patent-pending search (SEO) technology, they offer one-click pin-point video search of captioned text.  This technology - using their Transendia media player - allows one click from Google or Bing or other search engines on a word or phrase spoken in a video.  Clicking on the search result takes the user to that exact spot in the video.  Fully searchable and accessible video examples may be seen at the following URL:   http://transendia.com/examples/ Realtime Transcription has a strong commitment to accessibility, bolstered by the President's background in working with persons with disabilities and ties to the captioning and hearing loss communities.

Industries: EdTech, Education, Publishing, Reading Apps, Social Assistance
Industry Groups: Apps, Content and Publishing, Education, Government and Military, Media and Entertainment, Software
Description: Read Naturally's innovative, research-proven reading programs provide high-quality interventions and differentiated instruction.
Full Description: Read Naturally's innovative, research-proven reading programs provide high-quality interventions and differentiated instruction for struggling readers of all ages and abilities – whether special education, ELL, Title I, mainstream, or adult – to improve reading skills, gain confidence and transform attitudes toward school and learning. Read Live, our most popular intervention and assessment tool, uses a powerful web-technology platform providing administrators the ability to easily deploy these programs on a single computer or across an entire district. Read Live features a reading intervention, Read Naturally Live and an assessment tool, Benchmark Assessor Live. Students work mostly independently in Read Naturally Live by reading high-interest, nonfiction stories and completing a number of activities including a vocabulary-boosting game, Wordtastic. This motivating and engaging curriculum and format builds students'​ fluency, vocabulary, comprehension and phonics skills. Read Naturally launched two new programs in 2014, Funēmics and Splat-O-Nym. Funēmics teaches the foundational skills of phonemic awareness to small groups of pre-readers or struggling readers. Students gain awareness of words’ syllables, rhyming, phonemes and phoneme manipulation using scripted lessons that correspond to interactive exercises displayed for students on an iPad. Splat-O-Nym is an iPad app designed to build vocabulary. Students independently play games that include over 7,000 synonym questions, 1,000 antonym questions, and 600 meaning-from-context questions. Other research-based interventions programs from Read Naturally include: Read Naturally GATE, Signs for Sounds, Word Warm-ups, One Minute Reader and Take Aim! at Vocabulary.

Description: Share moments. Capture reactions.
Full Description: Have you ever sent a friend a photo or video and wished you could visibly witness their reaction rather than receive the same old ‘LOL’ or ‘OMG’ response? Well, it’s now possible with Reactr. Available to download for free, Reactr is a quick, fun and simple-to-use photo and video-sharing app with a real-time benefit. Once the photo is taken or video recorded, the sender can customize their message and share with their friends. Upon receipt, the recipient can then share their real-time reaction, via photo or video, with the original sender so that they can see first-hand how they responded. Reactr has the privacy of users covered, too. The captured reaction is not automatically sent back to the sender in response. The recipient must first decide if they want to share their reaction or not. Reactions can only be shared with friends, too, so there’s no risk of sending a reaction to someone you don’t know.  And your favorite reactions can be downloaded so that those moments can be captured forever.

Description: Rasmussen Reports is an American polling and media company.
Full Description: Rasmussen Reports is an electronic media company specializing in the collection, publication and distribution of public opinion polling information. It was founded by Scott Rasmussen in 2003.  Rasmussen Reports' work is followed by millions on a wide variety of media platforms. We regularly release our results at RasmussenReports.com, America's most visited public opinion website, and through a daily email newsletter, Twitter and Facebook. Rasmussen also has a strong social media presence with more than 46,000 Facebook friends and more than 244,000 Twitter followers. During 2009, RasmussenReports.com passed Gallup to become the most searched-for source of public opinion information on Google. Rasmussen Reports generates original public opinion data that is relevant, timely and accurate (review our track record). The company conducts national tracking surveys every night on political, economic and lifestyle issues. Additional polls on state elections and other topics are routinely added to the mix. “If it’s in the news, it’s in our polls” is more than our slogan. It’s how we do business. All Rasmussen Reports polls are paid for by Rasmussen Reports and used to support our news service. We cannot be hired to conduct a poll for anyone. It offers QuVIS Acuity, an editing and mastering server for production and post-production industries; QuVIS Ovation, a player for fixed displays, including 3D and multi-screen applications, trade shows, museums, theme parks, and entertainment venues; and QuVIS Encore, a production, acquisition, and playback server that records and plays HD and SD in real time. In addition, it offers QuVIS QuStudio, a digital rights management software suite for digital cinema content producers and their agents; QuVIS QuShow, a show management system that provides centralized control of digital cinema theatre operations; and QuVIS Cinema System that provides exhibitors a commercial grade platform to address the needs of varying theatrical needs. It offers its products through a network of distributors in the United States and internationally. QuVIS, Inc. was formerly known as Real Video, Inc. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Topeka, Kansas. Description: Qrowd is a new type of start page, coined a mashable webtop. Qrowd is both a widget platform and a customizable start page. Qrowd consists
Full Description: Qrowd is a new type of start page, coined a "mashable webtop".  Qrowd is both a widget platform and a customizable start page. Qrowd consists of three main components:  a visual wiring editor, a part IDE, and a webtop. Native widgets in Qrowd are constructed using a visual wiring editor that allows data sources to be loaded, manipulated, and displayed with ease.  The visual wiring editor connects software parts together and configures them into a finished widget that can run either in the webtop or on external web pages. The software parts themselves can be edited by software developers knowing Javascript and XML with the part IDE.  Qrowd is a fully extensible system. The webtop is a highly customizable dashboard to the Internet.  Users can aggregate all their frequently accessed web content into a single place.  Native widgets feature integrated alerts.  Third party widgets such as Google Gadgets can be added to the webtop via wrapper widgets.  Content from almost any web page can also be clipped with a web page clipping widget. By overlaying a widget platform with a webtop, Qrowd enables users to take data of interest from around the web, manipulate it, and then choose how to best visualize it.

Description: Qoture is an app that extracts measurements from photographs so online shoppers can purchase the proper clothing size.
Full Description: Qoture is an app that extracts your measurements from photographs so online shoppers can purchase the proper clothing size. Shopping online for clothes is challenging because different brands have different sizes. Ambiguous sizing is a leading cause for shopping cart abandonment and shoppers who risk it have 1 in 5 chance of returning it.  From 2 orthogonal photos, we can suggest your best fit. Other body scanners exist, but require specialized hardware. The Qoture app utilizes a standard camera – a device available on every cell phone. Our team includes computer graphics PhDs from the University of Calgary and we are currently in raising a round of capital through Kickstarter to fund research & development.  The introduction of the Qoture App could save shoppers the hassle of returns (and guys from the dog house!)

QBeo recognizes that everyone sees the world differently.  The company’s ImageOp™ technology lets people quickly and easily enhance images to their preference by comparing and rating them against a series of variations. Description: Pyromaniac.com is a fantasy football website that provides news, rankings, and video highlights.
Full Description: Is there a better feeling than when your starting fantasy receiver catches a 60 yard TD? Actually, there is. Starting the QB that threw it to him as well. Our goal with Pyromaniac.com is to bring that level of exhilaration to our users on a daily basis. Focusing solely on pro football, using tomorrow's web technologies, searing visuals, and compelling editorial/analysis, we will set the industry ablaze. Our obsession to entertain both the left and right sides of the brain will leave both the casual and maniacal fantasy enthusiasts on fire. Our fantasy football fixation began 21 years ago manually scoring our league from the Chicago Sun-Times. After a decade of inking league results into a Steno-pad, fantasy sports migrated to the web. Unfortunately for the almost 30 million of us who play today, the industry remains largely stagnant; using the same tired search technology, stale graphics, and timid banter. Enter Pyromaniac.com. Our content will focus on preparing users to succeed in battle on draft day and each week during the season. Player profiles will read like statistical and analytical armories. Information will come from all angles with a visual assault on your senses. We want you to be a part of this community from the beginning; using our resources and staying with us as we grow into a full-service commissioner league by the 2010 season. At Pyromaniac.com, we are as devoted to our users as they are to football. We are a feedback driven community that will always remain responsive to your suggestions; even when we blow up like the LT's did in 2006 (31 TD's) and 1986 (20.5 sacks). Together we will leap into a brave new fantasy world; no longer constrained by yesterday's technology. Our promise to you; fantasy football will never look or feel the same way again. Please contact us at contact@pyromaniac.com

Description: Pure Digital Technologies provides imaging solutions for the mass market, including the Flip Video series of digital camcorders.
Full Description: Pure Digital Technologies is the provider of innovative imaging solutions for the mass market, including the Flip Video family of digital camcorders. The Flip Video camera is a simple digital camcorder designed especially for Internet video sharing. The camera contains on-board software enabling one-click uploads to [YouTube](/organization/youtube), AOL Video, [MySpace](/organization/myspace) and other websites. The latest model, the Flip Ultra, has been the best-selling camcorder on [Amazon.com](/organization/amazon) since the day of its debut, capturing about 13% of the camcorder market. It captures video in 640x480 resolution at 30 frames per second. It uses 2 AA batteries. It lacks a memory card extension slot but can be connected to a computer with its pop-out USB connector, without the need for a cable. It is simple to use, lacking most of the features of more advanced cameras. Depending on memory size, the current ("Ultra") model camera retails for $150 (1 GB flash memory for about 30 minutes of video) or $180 (s2 GB flash memory). Pure Digital Technologies was acquired in 2009 by [Cisco](/organization/cisco), and in April 2011 Cisco [announced](http://newsroom.cisco.com/press-release-content?type=webcontent&articleId=775104) it was shutting down the Flip line.

Description: Proxifeed creates and broadcasts automated postings into users' Twitter feeds.
Full Description: Proxifeed creates and broadcasts automated postings into your Twitter feed. Use keywords that match your areas of interest and let Proxifeed identify relevant real-time web content. Mix-in other RSS sources too. See your feed become exciting and engaging. More and more people will notice and start following you.  Define your interest: Use keywords to define the area of interest that you want to tweet about. E.g. for your Twitter account on "clean tech" use "solar energy", "hybrid cars", "wind power",... - the more specific terms you enter the more specific the tweets will become and draw attention. Auto-content: Proxifeed will broadcast the best and freshest real-time web content from hundreds of thousands of RSS feeds matching your keywords. Mix-in other RSS sources: Define a list of other RSS feeds and Proxifeed will take selected items and add them into your stream of posts. Frequency: Configure the frequency of your postings and match them to your normal posting behavior. Where to broadcast: Let Proxifeed post to one or more Twitter accounts. Set up multiple Proxifeeds for different Twitter accounts. Track your stats: See your follower base and clicks grow across the different Proxifeeds you've set-up. In-feed ads: Proxifeed is a test bed for contextually relevant content ads that will let you monetize your feed. Opt-out anytime.

Description: Create powerful online portals to streamline ordering, production, fulfillment, and distribution of all marketing assets.
Full Description: Propago was born and raised in Austin, Texas. Their story goes a little something like this. Propago was started within a large commercial printing conglomerate as an internal application to serve clients and support backend operations for those clients. Born as a simple and straightforward solution to simplify and streamline the company’s production and fulfillment processes, Propago gradually matured over the years to become a comprehensive Marketing Management and Fulfillment Platform. Since its release in 2001, Propago has grown based on their clients’ feedback, requirements and challenges. They have successfully enhanced, renewed and optimized Propago to meet their clients’ needs and market demands. With new features being added all the time, such as the personalization engine, flexible approval workflows, robust budgetary controls, extensive standard and custom reporting, digital asset management, and their very latest Propago addition - a powerful retail signage management solution, Propago has become an unstoppable force in the marketing software world. In 2015, the team responsible for building and maintaining the Propago platform was given the opportunity to spin the technology away from the parent company and form a completely stand-alone organization. They will always value the 14 years of real-world experience the platform has gained from their childhood within a larger organization and many of the original companies continue to be their clients today. Now they look forward to their teenage years and pushing the platform even further in the open market.

Description: PredictiveIntent develops behavioral analysis and targeting software for digital businesses.
Full Description: PredictiveIntent is a leading expert in the development of behavioural analysis and targeting software for digital businesses. **PersonalMerchant** is a fully-featured E-Commerce recommendations suite, enabling online retailers to present the right products or blog articles to the right people, at the right time. PersonalMerchant can be connected through deeply integrated extensions for Magento, Visualsoft, Interspire and OXID eShop or through a simple API to connect with any e-commerce platform. Through the patent-pending Suggestion Choreography Technology, and smart algorithms coupled with Layered Logic suggestion sets (which can be easily adapted on our online Dashboard), retailers can increases in revenue by around 20%, increases in loyalty and return purchases and increases Average Order Values. Behaviourally personalised emails are also supported, as is social media support with Twitter and Facebook (coming soon) support.  PersonalMerchant services are available both directly from PredictiveIntent and via solution partners such as Pod1, Grand River and Session Digital. The **IntentPredictionServer** is available as a SaaS or SaaP framework enabling the recommendation technology to be integrated with any content serving platform, from mobile portals to advertising servers. Personalising digital experiences has been shown to increase customer loyalty, consumption, relevance and revenue. The detailed online reporting enables businesses to observe and understand customer behaviour with more clarity, detail and accuracy than ever before possible.

Description: Polkast develops cloud-based apps that enable users to access files on their PCs via iOS and Android devices.
Full Description: Everyone is talking about cloud services. Instead of sending your content up to the cloud, Polkast brings the cloud to you. Polkast creates your own personal cloud dynamically, letting your mobile devices directly access your home base computers. Polkast automatically detects your proximity to the PC and choose the fastest route: Wi-Fi or over the internet. Polkast then opens a secure connection and encrypts all transmissions. So you can securely access all of your content directly. By maximizing Wi-Fi bandwidth, Polkast allows users to retrieve any of their data files up to 10x faster than the traditional cloud. This peer-to-peer approach also means privacy and security are 100% under your control. And removing cloud storage limitations means access to 100% of your files. Using Polkast is as easy as downloading the free app and logging in. Get access to 500 GB of content instead of 2-5 GB. Fetch a video file from across the room takes a few minutes not hours. Share without file size limits.

Description: Pligg enables users to create an online community where anyone can submit articles, vote on them, and leave comments.
Full Description: Pligg CMS enables you to create on online community where users can submit articles, vote on them, and leave comments. While most content management systems are designed for only a handful of authors, Pligg CMS was designed from the ground up as a way for a large number of contributors to submit and moderate content. Registered users, as well as visitors in some circumstances, are in control of the website’s content. Requirements: Pligg CMS runs on LAMP servers (Linux, Apache, MySQL 5+, and PHP 5+). This means that most shared, VPS, or dedicated web hosts will be compatible out of the box. If you are interested in trying out Pligg without signing up for a web hosting account, you can run it on your local computer for free using software applications like WAMP (Windows) or MAMP (Mac).

It’s a home base for your videos, photos, podcasts, movies, web shows, news, live tv, and even your music collection. With Plex you become master of your mediaverse. Industries: Cloud Computing, Cloud Infrastructure, Gaming, Video Games, Video Streaming
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Gaming, Hardware, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Software, Video
Description: Playkey is a technology that enables high-quality cloud - gaming experience for users, regardless of the type of device they have.
Full Description: Playkey is a break through technology that enables high-quality gaming experience for users, regardless of the type of device they have (smatphones, tablets, smart TVs, and even outdated, low-performance equipment).  Our adaptive game streaming protocol is driven by AI and based on decentralized infrastructure, achieving significant reduction in the cost of delivery for content providers and low latency for end-users.  Playkey Streaming Protocol enables FullHD picture at 60 frames per second and latency of 4 ms.    Playkey is a cloud gaming solution, invented to make all hardcore games available on any device (Smart TV, PC, Mac, IPTV set-top-box, gaming console, tablet) without requirements to high productivity CPU and GPU.  Playkey service is based on streaming technology, when game is launched on a server and streamed to the end user device. User just need a device capable to display video stream and a broadband internet connection 4mbps+. Adaptive bit rate used to personalize stream to high speed and low broadband speed customers. To play the game you just need a controller (gamepad, keyboard or mouse) and download a small plugin on your device.  Playkey mission is to make games available everywhere and for everybody.

Full Description: Plan Express, Inc., a document management, printing, and logistics company, engages in the management, printing, reproduction, and distribution of construction documents, plans, and contract specifications. The company offers centralized print ordering that includes organizing project plans, scanning plans and documents, accepting digital uploads, and indexing and posting to a plan room; document management, such as online plan rooms, revision tracking, digital archiving, and document storage; distribution and logistics; and other services comprising color reproductions. It serves engineers, architects, owners, construction managers, and contractors. The company has strategic partnerships with Reed Construction Data, Onvia, and USGN. Plan Express, Inc. was founded in 1994 and is based in Memphis, Tennessee with additional offices in Phoenix, Arizona; and Chicago, Illinois. The company has hub print fulfillment centers in Chicago, Illinois; New York, New York; Philadelphia, Pennsylvania; Boston, Massachusetts; Dallas, Texas; Phoenix, Arizona; and San Mateo, California.

Description: Pinnion lets you create sophisticated surveys without code that look great on all devices.
Full Description: Pinnion is a platform for maintaining customer and audience relationships through surveys, polls, quizzes, and trivia games. These can be distributed across browsers on any device, SMS, and integrated with apps for iPhone and Android, as well as the free Pinnion plugin for WordPress, and embed codes that allow questionnaires to be placed in any webpage. Users can distribute a Pinnion to any or all of these outlets at simultaneously, then view responses from all outlets in a single, real-time reporting tool.  Pinnion is designed to be ideal for any topic or industry and we've seen a particular interest in its audience response capabilities. Broadcasters such as KCTS-TV and KNHC-FM are using Pinnion, as are Time, Inc. and the Wall Street Journal.  Users can segment their audience using Channels, while audience members also have the power to join or leave Channels at any time based on their individual interests. Pinnions are distributed to each audience member's Channel Page, then automatically disappear once the Pinnion is completed or expired, whichever comes first.

Industries: PaaS, Photography, Search Engine
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Software
Description: Stock Photo Industry Wide Search, Sales, and delivery platform. Our purpose, our mission, our passion Foster an environment which values
Full Description: Stock Photo Industry Wide Search, Sales, and delivery platform.  Our purpose, our mission, our passion Foster an environment which values photography. Empower photographers to succeed. Encourage photographers' passion to create. PicturEngine brings image buyers and sellers together with just a click.  Serving as a resource and guide to the entire stock industry, we make every stock photo, Illustration, vector and footage searchable through one easy-to-use platform. Just like other search engines, PicturEngine is FREE to use.  The ability to quickly and easily search the whole stock photo industry at once saves time and ensures the best results. Larger stock photo agencies are included within the organic results.  Photographers and smaller photo agencies, pay a small ‘advertising’ subscription fee to be included within the search results.  It’s important to note that search results are UNBIASED, meaning advertisers cannot pay to gain higher ranking within the search.             As stock photo agencies have grown to mammoth proportions, finding the "right" image is more difficult and time-consuming than ever.  Searching through countless images within multiple agency archives has become commonplace, and image buyers say they need to find images faster.  Because only a few agencies practice "image exclusivity," the same content appears over and over again, further complicating the search for stock photos.  PicturEngine search results quickly provide image buyers with industrywide results without duplication.  We show buyers the base agency, removing unnecessary intermediaries, and encourage exploration of content by providing a closer look at "similars," enabling the buyer to make an informed purchasing decision. PicturEngine makes finding the right image fast and easy.

Industries: iOS, Mobile, Photography, Real Time, Social Media, Video
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Other, Platforms, Software, Video
Description: Picshare is a location-based photo app that allows one to share photos with friends.
Full Description: Instant and effortless sharing of photos and videos. Picshare is a location-based photo and video app that allows you to instantly and effortlessly share photos and videos with friends and others nearby, simply with the push of a button! Take a photo or video with picshare, and the app automatically shares it with other nearby users - no texting, emailing, or networking required. Picshare's proprietary technology takes away all the work required of sharing. Simply open the app and take a photo or shoot a video, as you would your camera, and you're done! Photos and videos taken within 500 meters are gathered in your personal picshare stream, instantly generating an album of your day's events. Want to download a few for safe keeping ? go for it ! Want to upload to Facebook, Instagram or Twitter? Picshare allows you to do that as well. All you have to do is point and click, and picshare does the rest of the work for you. Of course, how much you share is up to you. Picshare allows you to select who exactly can see your photos and videos, be it your Facebook friends or everyone nearby. So if you're at a private party, you can keep it private and share only with your closest friends; if you're at a football game, feel free to share it with everyone in the stadium. No matter how big or small, you're able to create a record of your memories with no effort at all and control who you share with. * Automatically share photos and videos with friends and other users within 500 meters * Download any photos and videos shared to store memories of your favorite events. * View your stream to see all photos and videos taken nearby - an album created without any work from you. * Adjust your privacy settings to decide who exactly can see your photos and videos. * See how many people have downloaded your photos and videos. * Connect with Facebook, Twitter, and email to share your photos and videos with the world. Picshare is the first-of-its-kind, designed to allow you to share experiences without the effort required by texts, emails, and social networks.  Andriod & Windows versions coming soon.............
